El negocio lo aprendió  de su madre desde hace 20 años y actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y ropa interior. Su horario de atención inicia por las mañanas de 7:00 a.m y culmina como a las 6:00 p.m. Ricarda gracias a Dios es una persona sana, muy jovial, amable y muy conocida por sus vecinos. Ella solicita este préstamo para comprar ropa nueva y así surtir su negocio de estilos actuales y acordes a la temporada de verano. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá llamar la atención de más clientes y seguirá teniendo una actividad económica que le permita cubrir sus gastos. Su sueño es tener un local propio y surtir bien su negocio. Este es el segundo financiamiento que obtiene Ricarda en FAMA y hasta el momento ha cumplido puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en: Ricarda is a member of the “Fourteenth of February” Solidarity Group. She is 44 years old and a single mother with two children who help her economically. They are good girls, responsible and hardworking. The business that they learned from their mother, twenty years ago, is the sales of new clothes and underclothes. They work from 7:00am until 6:00 pm. Ricarda, thanks to God, is healthy, cheerful, friendly and well known among her neighbors. She is asking for this loan to buy new clothes in order to have a greater inventory of new clothing styles and summer clothes for the coming summer season. With the help of this loan she can attract more customers and continue with this economic activity that allows her to cover her expenses. Her dream is to have a permanent location and a larger variety of goods for her business. This is the second loan that Ricarda has received from FAMA. Up to now she has been punctual with her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy blouses, underclothes and other items.

loans.name: Elsa Carmen

texts.es: Elsa es socia del Banco Comunal Unión II,es socia de Finca hace 16 años, es dueña de una casa de 4 pisos y alquila cuartos, ella pudo construir su casa con la ayuda de los prestamos que ha ido recibiendo, también se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, le encanta las capitaciones por que le ayudan a poder sobrellevar las dificultades que tienen con su enfermedad, ella sufre de Artrosis, esta muy contenta porque puede ser mejor persona en su casa como en su negocio, todos los logros que tiene fue gracias a la ayuda de Finca, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá  para la mejora de uno de los cuartos.
texts.en:
Elsa is a member of the "Union II" Communal Bank, and has been associated with Fina for some 16 years. She owns a 4-story house and rents out rooms. Elsa was able to construct her house with the help of loans she has received. She also sells beauty products. 

Elsa is enchanted with Finca's training sessions because they help her overcome the difficulties she has with her illness. She suffers from degenerative osteoarthritis. Elsa is very content because now she can be a better person in her home and in her business. All her achievements have been thanks to the aid of Finca. 

Now, with this loan, she will invest in improving one of her rental rooms.

loans.use: to complete a room in her house to be rented.

loans.name: Luz Paulina

texts.es:
Luz Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal “las Mujeres de Santa Rosa de Arapa II”  ubicado en el distrito de Arapa, provincia  Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, está separada y tiene dos hijas. La señora estudio solo hasta la secundaria.
 
Trabaja desde hace dos años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio venta de granos de la región, también se dedica a la compra y venta de animales como chanchos y ovinos.

Con su nuevo préstamo solicitado de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles comprará ocho chanchos para su respectivo engorde y venderlos en las fiestas. 

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener su casa y mejorar el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones y las capacitaciones


En la foto se muestra junto a una de sus hijas.
texts.en:
Luz Paulina is a member of the “Women of Santa Rosa de Arapa II” Community Bank. . It is located in the Arapa District, in the Azángaro Province, in the department of Puno.
She is 29 years old, separated and has two children. She has a secondary education.
She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the past two years. Her first loan was for 500.00 new soles, a loan, which she used in her business selling local grains. She also buys and sells animals such as pigs and sheep.
With this new loan that she is requesting, for 1,000.00 new soles, she will buy eight pigs that she will fatten up and sell for the holidays. Her future dreams are to have her own house and improve her business. What she likes the most about the community bank are their meetings and their capacity building. In this photo you see her with one of her two daughters.

loans.use: to buy eight pigs to fatten them up for sales.

loans.name: Evarista Julia

texts.es:
Evarista es socia del Banco Comunal “las Mujeres de Santa Rosa de Arapa II”  ubicado en el distrito de Arapa, provincia  Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente. Con cinco hijos, la señora estudio educación secundaria incompleta.
 
Su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de animales, trabaja hace dos años con Movimiento Manuela Ramos, también la señora se dedica a la venta de terrenos.

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 nuevo soles, comprará terrenos para construirlo y luego venderlos en la mina, su esposo trabaja en la mina rinconada. 

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener un camión para llevar mercaderías a la mina.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad, responsabilidad y las charlas.
texts.en:
Evarista is a member of the “Women of Santa Rosa de Arapa II” Community Bank. . It is located in the Arapa District, in the Azángaro Province, in the department of Puno. She is 32 years old, has a partner and five children. She did not complete her secondary education.
Her first loan was for 500.00 new soles. She used this money in her business of selling animals. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the past two years. She also sells land.
With this new loan, of 2,000.00 new soles, she will buy land in order to build on it and sell it in this mining community. Her husband works in the Rinconada mine. Her dream for the future is to have a truck in order to bring merchandise to the mine. What she likes the most about the community bank is the punctuality, responsibility and the lectures.

loans.use: to buy land in order to build on it and sell it to the mine.

loans.name: Gulistan

texts.ru: Гулистан жительница района Кубодиен. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее шестеро детей. Гулистан имеет среднее образование. Она более 7 лет занимается скотоводством. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Gulistan is a resident of the Qubadiyon district.  She is 39 years old, married and has six children.  Gulistan has a secondary education.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for over seven years.  She is requesting this loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Abdurashid

texts.ru: Абдурашид житель района Кубодиен. Ему 55 лет Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его дети находятся на заработках заграницей. Сам он занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается три года. Кредит берет для закупа телят и корма для скота.
texts.en: Abdurashid is a resident of the Qubadiyon district.  He is 55 years old, married and has four children.  His children are all working abroad.  Abdurashid is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for three years.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves and livestock feed.

loans.use: to buy calves and livestock feed

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Сухроб житель района Шахритус. Ему 36 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он вместе со всей семьей занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Сухроб имеет высшее образование. Он по профессии учитель. В этой области Сухроб работает десять лет. Он берет кредит для посева пшеницы, картошки и других видов овощей.
texts.en: Suhrob is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 36 years old, married and has three children.  Together with his family, he is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  Suhrob has a higher education.  He is a teacher and has been working in this field for ten years.  He is requesting this loan to sow wheat, potatoes and other types of vegetables.

loans.use: to sow wheat, potatoes and other types of vegetables

loans.name: Khurram

texts.ru: Хуррам проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Хуррам занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается десять лет. Кредит берет кредит для закупа семян овощей.
texts.en: Khurram lives in the Shahrituz district.  He is 37 years old, married and has three children.  Khurram is involved in agriculture.  He has been in this business for ten years.  He is requesting this loan to buy vegetable seeds.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seeds

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia es socia del Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Acari”  ubicado en el distrito, provincia  Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y tiene un hijo.  Realizó estudios de educación secundaria.
 
La señora Alicia es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora a trabajar con Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicita un préstamo por la suma de S/. 1000.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizará para comprar un saco de ají, orégano, la señora vende sus productos en Desaguadero.

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener su casa y carro para el servicio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es  la facilidad del préstamo
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the “Santa Cruz of Acari” Community Bank. It is located in the provincial district of Yunguyo in the department of Puno. She is 25 years old, single and has a child. She has finished her secondary education.
Alicia is a new member who recently began working with the Manuela Ramos Movement. She is asking for this loan, of 1,000.00 new soles, which she will use to buy bags of peppers and oregano. She sells these products in Desaguadero.
Her dreams for the future are to have her own house and a car for her business.
What she likes the most about the community bank is the ease of obtaining a loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of pepper and oregano.

loans.name: Juana Bautista

texts.es:
Juana es socia del Banco Comunal “las Mujeres de Santa Rosa de Arapa II”  ubicado en el distrito de Arapa, provincia Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene una hija pequeña, realizó estudios de educación superior tècnica.
 
Trabaja desde hace año y medio con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó para comprar una mesa para la máquina de cocer ya que la señora se dedica a confeccionar ternos y arreglos de prendas en general.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar una mesa grande para cortar telas y una maquina semi industrial para la confección de sus ternos, trabaja sola en el negocio, su esposo trabaja en albañil. 

Su sueño para el futuro  es agrandar la empresa y poner una heladería.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las capacitaciones, las charlas y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the communal bank “Women of Santa Rosa of Arapa II,” located in the district of Arapa, Azángaro province, Department of Puno. She is 31 years old, a live-in partner, and has a young daughter. She started technical university courses. 
 
For a year and a half, she has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement. Her first loan was for S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, money which she used to buy a table for her sewing machine, as she makes suits and mends other garments. 

She is requesting a new loan of S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, money which she will use to buy a large table for cutting fabric and a semi-industrial machine for making suits. She works alone; her husband is a construction worker.

Her dream is to expand her business and open an ice cream shop in the future. What she likes most about her communal bank are the training, discussions, and the credit facilities.

loans.use: to buy a large table for cutting fabric and a semi-industrial machine for making suits.

loans.name: Lucrecia

texts.es:
Lucrecia es socia del Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Acari”  ubicado en el distrito, provincia  Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos en estudios.
La señora cuenta con estudios de educación primaria.
 
Trabaja desde hace ocho años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su tienda de abarrotes, también la señora se dedica a la venta de ají.

En la actualidad solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero con la que comprará azúcar, arroz y leche, trabaja sola en el negocio su esposo trabaja en el sector de educación.

Su sueño para el futuro  es seguir operando en el negocio y mejorarlo.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro
texts.en:
Lucrecia is a member of the communal bank "Santa Cruz de Acari," located in the district and province of Yunguyo in the department of Puno.  She is 42 years old, married and has 2 children who are in school.

Lucrecia has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for 8 years.  Her first loan was for the sum of 300 Peruvian soles, which she invested in her grocery store.  Lucrecia also has a business selling chili peppers.

At this time, she is requesting a new loan in the amount of 300 Peruvian soles to purchase sugar, rice and milk.  She works by herself in her business; her husband works in education.

Lucrecia's dream for the future is to continue to operate her business and improve it.

What she likes most about her communal bank are the easy payment terms on the loans, and the savings accounts.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and milk

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita is 59 years old and lives in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has four children. She works in the fish industry, selling fish for a living. She has been doing this for 10 years, and has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to purchase more fish to sell. Lolita has been a member of PMPC for seven years and hopes, in the future, to purchase a vehicle for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a 23-year-old married man from Trinidad, Bohol. His wife works as a manicurist.

Henry provides vulcanizing services to his community. He has had this business for two years. Henry does not have his own shop yet. People in his community calls for his service whenever they need him. Henry works hard to improve his business and save for the future. 

Henry said he joined CEVI because he needs additional capital for his business. He plans to use his loan to purchase tools and gasoline. 

Henry hopes to have his own space for a vulcanizing shop soon.

loans.use: to purchase tools and gasoline.

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es:
Yaneth es socia del Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Acari”  ubicado en el distrito, provincia  Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 26 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un hijo, realizo estudios de educación secundaria.
 
La señora Yaneth trabaja hace dos años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra de llicllas (telas).

Yaneth solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1,200.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizara para comprar cincuenta unidades de llicllas, estos lo vende en la localidad de Juliaca, su esposo trabaja realizando servicios de costura.

Su sueño para el futuro  es viajar con la mercadería a otros lugares y generar mayores ingresos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones, la puntualidad, el ahorro y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Yaneth is a member of the “Santa Cruz de Acari” Communal Bank, in the Yunguyo province of the department of Puno. She’s 26 years old, finished junior high school and has a partner and one child.
Yaneth has been working with Movimiento Manuel Ramos for two years. Her 1st loan was for 500 soles, which she invested in the purchase of llicllas (traditional fabric made into a shall or to carry babies).
Yaneth is requesting a new loan for 1,200 soles, which she will use to buy 50 units of llicllas in the town of Juliaca, where her husband offers his services as a tailor. 
Her dream for the future is to travel to other areas with her merchandise to generate more income. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the meetings, punctuality, savings and income.

loans.use: buy 50 units of llicllas (traditional fabric made into a shall or to carry babies).

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel has been in the business of raising hogs for 5 years. She earns 3000 PHP per month with her business. Raquel is able to help pay for her family's basic needs with her income. She works hard to improve her business and save more for the future.

Raquel requested a loan to purchase pig feeds and vitamins. She hopes to continue earning through raising pigs. Raquel has 7 children aged between 1 and 20 and she hopes for all of them to finish college and have bright futures.

loans.use: buy pig feeds and vitamins

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nelda

texts.en: Nelda is 46 years old and lives in Señor, Sinacaban. She is married, has four children and earns a living by running a general store where she sells a variety of products. She has had this business for four years and is requesting a loan of PHP 9,000 to purchase additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents. Nelda has been a member of PMPC for three years and hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional products to sell, as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents.

loans.name: Andresa

texts.en: Andresa is 48 years old and lives in Senior, Sinacaban. She is a widow, has one child and earns a living by running a general store where she sells variety of products. She has had this business for seven years and is requesting a loan for PHP 12,000 to buy additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents. Andresa has been a member of PMPC for seven years and hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose B. caballero de 41 años de edad, casado, y responsable. Se mantiene con su trabajo de recamarero en uno de los hoteles de la capital. Asegura el señor que a traves de los financiamientos otorgados por Afodenic y con sus esfuerzos de parte de su esposa y el; es como han podido verle avances a la infraestructura de su vivienda. Con este credito lo que se proyecta es la mejora a la parte de cocina y baño de su hogar y para ello necesitara comprar materiales de construccion tales como: cemento, hierro, bloques, piedrin y otros. Hoy en dia Don Jose expresa sentirse muy conteto por las metas alcanzadas en lo que corresponde a la construccion de su vivienda ya  que una mejor habitad les dará a su esposa y su pequeña hija mejores niveles de vida.
texts.en:
Jose, age 41, is married and a responsible gentleman. He continues in his job with the housekeeping department at one of the hotels in the capital. Jose has secured himself using the loans provided by AFODENIC. Through his own efforts and those of his wife, they have been able to make improvements to the infrastructure of their home.

With this loan, Jose proposes to improve part of the kitchen and bathroom in his home. In order to do this, he needs to buy construction materials such as cement, iron, blocks, gravel, and other supplies. Don Jose now says that he is very content with the goals he has accomplished in terms of the construction of his house, which will provide his wife and young daughter a better environment and an improved standard of living.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for making improvements to the bathroom and kitchen in his home.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es socia del Banco Comunal “Santa Cruz de Acari”  ubicado en el distrito, provincia  Yunguyo y departamento de Puno, tiene 75 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos independientes.  La señora no cuenta con estudios.
 
Margarita trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 2,500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar mercaderías como chompas, llicllas (telas), mantones, mandiles, etc., en el negocio le ayuda sus hijos, la mercadería la vende en las ferias de la localidad.

Su sueño para el futuro  es seguir operando en el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  la facilidad del préstamo
texts.en:
Margarita is a member of the “Santa Cruz de Acari” Communal Bank, in the Yunguyo province of the department of Puno. She’s a 75 year old married mother of children who are now independent. She has no schooling.

Margarita has been working with Movimiento Manuel Ramos for six years. Her 1st loan was for 300 soles, which she invested in her clothing sales business.

Margarita is requesting a new loan for 2,500 soles, which she will use to buy merchandise like, sweaters, llicllas (traditional fabric used to carry babies), shawls, aprons, etc. Her children help her with the business. She sells her merchandise at the local fairs.

Her dream for the future is to continue operating her business and improving her income. What she likes most about the Communal Bank is how easy it is to get a loan.

loans.use: buy sweaters, llicllas (traditional fabric used to carry babies), shawls, aprons, etc.

loans.name: Liberato

texts.es:
Liberato tiene 40 años es casado vive con su señora Maria en casa propia en la ciudad de Carapeguá en la entrada mismo de la ciudad.
Se dedica en la gomería en su local propio hace más de 15 años con su hermano, el cual está ubicado en su casa. Comenta que gracias a este trabajo ha podido mantener a su familia y darles lo que necesitan para una vida honesta y digna.
Solicito el préstamo para la compra de cubiertas en general, lo cual le ayudara a seguir trabajando y creciendo como microempresario.
texts.en:
Liberato, 40, is married to María and lives with her in their own house located at the very entrance to the city of Carapeguá.  He has a tire repair shop where he’s worked with his brother for more than 15 years and that’s located at home.  He comments that thanks to this work he’s been able to support his family and give them what they need to live an honest, dignified life.

He asked for this loan to buy tires which will help him continue working and growing as a micro businessman.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Pabla

texts.es:
La señora Pabla tiene 61 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos, dos mayores de edad y un hijo menor. Pabla nos comenta que se dedica a la fabricación de chipas, con lo cual ha podido mantener y sacar adelante a su familia, esto también con la ayuda de su marido.
Ella se dedica a la actividad en forma diaria hace más de 30 años, ya cuenta con clientela formada, eso se debe a la buena calidad y al buen precio de sus productos. Debido a la gran cantidad de demanda de sus productos, solicita el préstamo para la compra de un congelador para la buena conservación de los ingredientes que utiliza para la fabricación de sus productos. Agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya y a Kiva por el apoyo que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Pabla is 61 years old, married, and has three children: two are adults and one is still a child.  Pabla tells us that her business is making 'chipas' (cheese buns).  This has enabled her to support her family and get them ahead in life with her husband's help.

Pabla has been working in this business every day for more than 30 years and she already has an established customer base owing to the good quality and good price of her products.  Due to the high demand for her products, she is requesting a loan to buy a freezer in which to keep the ingredients that she uses.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for the support that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy a freezer for her 'chiperia' (cheese roll business)

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.en: Gabriela is married with four children.  She is 48 years old and lives in Senior, Sinacaban in the Philippines.  Gabriela is a farmer and grows corn crops to earn a living.  She has been doing this for seven years.  Gabriela has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase additional inorganic and commercial fertilizers.  Gabriela has been a member of PMPC for three years.  In the future, Gabriela hopes to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her corn crops.

loans.name: Estela Maria

texts.en: Estela Maria is 41 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married, has six children and earns an income by running a store where she sells groceries and other items. She has had this business for 12 years, and is requesting a loan for PHP 15,000 to purchase more stock for her store. Estela Maria has been a member of PMPC for two years and hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks for her grocery store.

loans.name: Naviet

texts.en: Naveit, 52, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running grocery store and making baskets to sell for many years, and earns approximately $10 per day. Her husband is a garment worker who earns about $4 per day. Due to the difficulty this family faces in transportation, Naveit is requesting a loan for $1,000 to buy a motorbike to use to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the money she saves on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get a bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to use to commute.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
El Sr. Nelson es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pilar, es comerciante, además tiene un centro comercial situado en el pueblo de lomasgrande, es un centro comercial donde se comercializa todo tipos de productos agrícolas.
Comenta que realiza sus ventas en el interior comercializando sus productos agrícolas por los distritos cercanos a su ciudad. Lleva trabajando en esto hace 10 años, por lo que ya tiene una buena clientela. El se define como una persona muy trabajadora, que se esfuerza al máximo siempre para ayudar a su familia.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de productos agrícolas, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y de esa forma seguir creciendo como microempresario. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo por parte de Kiva y fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
Nelson is single living in the city of Pilar.  He’s a merchant and also has a store in the town of Lomasgrande where he sells all types of farm supplies.

He comments that he makes his sales in the interior of the country specializing in farm supplies in districts near his city.  He’s been working at this for the last 10 years so has a well-established clientele.  He defines himself as a very hardworking person who strives to the maximum to always help his family.

He requests the loan to buy farm supplies to continue working and growing as a micro businessman.  He’s grateful for the opportunity he’s getting from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to resell.

loans.name: Mary Anne

texts.en: Mary Anne is 54 years old and lives in Tinacla-an, Clarin in the Philippines.  She is married with two children.  Mary Anne has a store that sells a variety of products.  She has had this business for seven years.  Mary Anne has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase additional products for her store, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents.  She has been a member of PMPC for four years.  In the future, Mary Anne hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Claudia's Group

texts.en:
Claudia is 61 years old and lives in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines.  She is married with six children.  Claudia has a store that sells groceries and other items.  She has had this business for eight years and has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to purchase more stock items for her grocery store.  Claudia has been a member of PMPC for three years.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business.  

Claudia is the leader of a two person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: purchase more stock items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Banco Mujer En Busca Del Exito Group

texts.es:
Doña Jaidy es la presidenta de Banco Mujer En Busca del Éxito, tiene 44 años de edad es casada, y madre de una hija de 18 años, con quien vive junto a su esposo.  Su hija está estudiando enfermería, y es el motor que los impulsa a trabajar más y más cada día, para poder pagarle los  estudios, además es su máximo orgullo ya que desde muy pequeña siempre ha sido una buena estudiante. 
Jaidy es una mujer muy emprendedora, desarrolla  actividades comerciales, como venta de ropa, lencería, perfumes, cosméticos, artículos para el hogar y otros,  con esto ha logrado ayudar a su esposo con todos los gastos familiares. 
A pesar de que tiene muchos problemas de salud, ella desde muy temprano está realizando las labores domésticas, para tener suficiente tiempo para su negocio.  Y sabe que el crédito es una herramienta muy valiosa para su microempresa, este es el cuarto préstamo que solicitan, y ella al igual que sus compañeras han sido muy puntuales. 
Sus mayores anhelos es ver a su hija graduada, llegar a tener un bazar, y mejorar la condición económica de su familia, así como su salud, para seguir adelante. 
Junto a Doña Jaidy en el grupo están 7 socias más, todas realizan actividades comerciales y de servicios.
texts.en:
Jaidy is president of the “Mujer En Busca del Éxito” (Woman in Search of Success) communal bank.  She’s 44 years old, married and the mother of an 18 year old daughter who she lives with alongside her husband.  Her daughter is studying nursing and is the motivating force pushing her to work harder every day to pay for her studies.  Besides, she’s her greatest pride since she’s been a very good student since she was a little girl.

Jaidy is a very enterprising woman.  She carries out commercial activities like the sale of clothes, lingerie, perfume, cosmetics, items for the home and others.  With this she’s managed to help her husband meet family expenses.

Despite having many health issues, she starts doing her domestic chores very early in order to have enough time for her business.  She knows that credit is a very valuable tool for her micro business.  This is the fourth loan they’ve requested and she and her fellow members have been very punctual.

Her greatest wish is to see her daughter graduate, to have a store, for her family to be in better economic conditions, and to be healthy to continue forward.

There are seven members with Jaidy; they all carry out commercial and service activities.

loans.use: to buy clothes, lingerie, perfume, cosmetics and items for the home.

loans.name: Porfirio Modesto

texts.es:
Porfirio es un hombre de 47 años de edad, luchador y entusiasta, vive junto a su esposa la cual lo apoya mucho y es su mano derecha, y su hijo de 14 años de edad, el cual es su adoración y su fuerza para seguir adelante; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad conocida por sus Dunas, las cuales son visitadas por infinidad de turistas en todo el año al igual que la laguna de “Huacachina”, así como también se cultiva uno de los mejores algodones del mundo y el cultivo de espárragos; asimismo tiene un clima cálido en cualquier época del año. En su tiempo libre a Porfirio le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y siempre le pide a su esposa que le prepare su palto favorito el cual es “Tallarín Saltado”; el solo tuvo estudios primarios pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesor de matemática.

Profirió trabaja de sol a sol en su negocio de elaboración y venta de helados; trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque prepara productos de cálida y ofrece sus productos en puntos estratégicos.

Porfirio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada el podrá comprar ingredientes para la elaboración de sus helados (frutas, leche, entre otros) así como también para la compra de útiles escolares para su hijo, así el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y también darle los útiles necesarios a su hijo para que pueda ir a la escuela sin inconvenientes,  así seguirá trabajando día a día para poder realizar su gran sueño:” Ser un distribuidor de Helados”.
texts.en:
Porfirio is a tenacious and enthusiastic 47-year-old man.  He lives together with his wife who is a great support and his right-hand woman.  He also lives with his 14-year-old son who is his pride and joy and gives him the strength to carry on.  Their home is located in the city of Ica, a city that is known for its dunes which are visited by vast numbers of tourists all year round.  It is also known for the 'Huacachina Lake' and because the locals grow some of the best cotton in the world.  The area is also known for its asparagus and for the warm weather that it experiences year round.  In his free time, Porfirio likes to play soccer with his friends and he always asks his wife to prepare his favorite dish of 'tallarín saltado' (a stir fried, Asian/Peruvian fusion dish).  Porfirio only attended elementary school but he would like to have studied to become a math teacher.

Porfirio works from dawn to dusk making and selling ice cream.  He works around 10 hours a day and can serve up to 20 customers a day.  He believes that his business is doing well because he prepares good-quality products and sells them in strategic locations.

Porfirio is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help they are providing, he will be able to buy ingredients for making his ice creams (fruit, milk, etc.).  He will also be able to buy school supplies for his son.  This will enable him to both improve his income and also give his son all the supplies he needs in order to attend school without problems. Porfirio will continue working every day in order to fulfill his big dream: "to become an ice cream distributor".

loans.use: to buy ingredients (milk, fruit, etc.) and to buy school supplies

loans.name: Martha Esther

texts.es:
Martha tiene 33 años, vive junto a su pareja el cual trabaja como albañil y sus 2 hijas cuyas edades comprenden en 10 y 14 años a los cuales ama muchísimo y son su motor para salir adelante y mejorar cada día; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, hermosas playas, por la generosidad de sus pobladores y por ser la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano. En su tiempo libre a Martha le gusta pasear con sus hijas y disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”; ella solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Repostería ya que le agrada hacer dulces y pasteles.

Día a día Martha sale a trabajar en su negocio de venta de canchita salada (más conocido como maíz pop corn), camote frito y maní tostado, trabaja alrededor de 5 horas, en especial en horas de la tarde y noche ya que a esta hora los clientes siempre compran estos productos, diariamente puede llegar a atender hasta 60 clientes y ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y porque prepara sus productos con calidad y limpieza.

Martha está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado los prestatarios kiva ella podrá comprar maíz, maní, camotes que son los insumos para preparar sus productos al por mayor, así ella podrá mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y así seguir luchando día a día para ver realizado su sueño:” Darle una carrera universitaria  sus hijas”.
texts.en:
Martha, 33, lives with her spouse who works as a bricklayer and their two daughters who are 10 and 14 years old who she loves very, very much and are the motivating force for her to move forward and improve every day.  Their home is located in the city of Chincha, a city noted for its hot climate, its beautiful beaches, the generosity of its residents and for being the birthplace of great Peruvian sports heroes.  In her free time, Martha enjoys going out on excursions with her daughters and to enjoy one of her favorite dishes: the very delicious “Arroz con Pollo.”  She only studied up to fifth grade of secondary school but would have liked to have studied pastry making because she likes to make sweets and cakes.

Day to day Martha goes out to work in her business selling “canchita salada (better known as popcorn), fried sweet potato and roasted peanuts.  She works about 5 hours, especially in the afternoon and evening since this is the time customers always buy these products.  She can tend to up to 60 customers daily and she believes she does well in her business because she’s very kind and because she prepares products with quality and cleanliness.

Martha is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help Kiva lenders have given her she will be able to buy corn, peanuts and sweet potatoes, which are the ingredients to prepare her products, at wholesale so that she will be able to improve her income which will make it possible for her to improve her quality of life and continue striving daily to reach her dream: “To provide her daughters with university careers.”

loans.use: to buy corn, sweet potatoes and peanuts.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María, pertenece al Banco Comunal Santa Cruz de Acari, ubicado en Yunguyo y Puno, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada, y tiene 5 hijos, todos independientes.  La señora estudio hasta 2do de primaria.
 
La señora María trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace más de seis años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de animales, también vende productos de la región como quinua, chuño queso.

Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 4,000.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que utilizara para comprar un quintal de quinua, chuño, papa, tunta, dos arrobas de cebada molida y chuño molido, en el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo y sus hijos.

Su sueño para el futuro  es seguir operando en el negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  la facilidad del préstamo y la puntualidad.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the “Santa Cruz de Acari” Communal Bank, in the Yunguyo province of the department of Puno. She’s a 60-year-old, married, mother of five children who are now independent. She has a grade 2 education.

Maria has been working with Movimiento Manuel Ramos for more than six years. Her 1st loan was for 300 soles, which she invested in her animal sales business, she also sells products from the region like quinoa, chuño (a type of dried potato) and cheese.

She’s requesting a new loan for 4,000 soles which she will use to buy 100 Kg of quinoa, chuño (a type of dried potato), potatoes, tunta (dehydrated potato) and two 11.5 Kg bags of milled barley and milled dried potato. At her business, she works with her husband and children.

Her dream for the future is to continue running her business.

What she likes most about her Communal Bank is how easy it is to get a loan and punctuality.

loans.use: buy 100 Kg of quinoa, chuño (a type of dried potato), potatoes, tunta (dehydrated potato) and two 11.5 Kg bags of milled barley and milled dried potato.

loans.name: Omar Guillermo

texts.es:
Omar es un joven muy trabajador, tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto a su pareja la cual es su apoyo y mano derecha en todo lo que emprende; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los más hermosos atractivo turísticos del país el cual es “El Candelabro de paracas y las Islas ballestas”. Cuando dispone de algún tiempo libre disfruta de hacer deporte con sus amigos y los vecinos de su barrio. El solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres.

Día a día Omar trabaja muy duro como chofer de mototaxi, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas en el día y puede atender hasta 50 clientes diariamente, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque conoce los lugares céntricos de la ciudad y le permite tener mayor clientela y atiende de manera amable.

Omar está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un reforzamiento en la base del motor y pintar su moto, asi tendrá un vehículo más seguro y le permitirá transportar a los clientes de manera más segura y seguir trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Construir su casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Omar, 32, is a very hardworking young man.  He lives with his spouse who is his right hand support in everything he does.  His dwelling is located in the city of Pisco, a city noted for having one of the country’s most beautiful tourist attractions: The Paracas Candelabrum and the Ballestas Islands.  When he has free time he enjoys playing sports with his friends and neighbors.  He only studies up to fifth grade of secondary school because of his parents’ few economic resources.

Omar works hard day to day as a mototaxi driver; he spends about 10 hours daily at work and can take care of up to 50 customers daily.  He believes that he does well in his business because he knows the focal points of the city which allows him to have more customers and to take care of them kindly.

Omar is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to strengthen the base of his motor and paint his mototaxi so that his vehicle will be safer and he will be able to transport passengers more safely and continue working day to day to reach his great dream: “To build a house with substantial building materials.”

loans.use: to do some repairs on his vehicle.

loans.name: Amanda Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Amanda es una señora de 28 años está casada con el señor Alba Jhasmany juntos tienen una hija de 10 años, la cual asiste a una escuela de primaria, la señora Amanda vive en la comunidad de la maica sud  de la ciudad de Cochabamba en la casa de sus padres , ya que la casa de ella aún está en construcción , los padres le heredaron el terreno y ahí es donde está construyendo , actualmente viven los tres tan solo en  una habitación , donde todos están muy incomodos , la principal actividad de la señora Amanda es la venta de comida ( chicharrón de cerdo que es un plato típico de la zona , pato , conejo etc. ) , todos los fin de semanas a partir de viernes hasta el lunes , y el esposo trabaja como taxista todos los días , de esta manera los dos trabajan todos los días para terminar la construcción de su casa.
El anterior préstamo le ayudo mucho ya que con lo cual ha logrado comprar 10 cerdos a un precio muy bajo porque se le presento esa oportunidad, con lo cual ha logrado incrementar sus ingresos, y la señora Amanda se siente tan feliz  que con esa utilidad a logrado avanzar bastante en la construcción de su casa.
 El nuevo préstamo también es para la compra de por lo menos 20 cerdos y de esa manera tendrá acumulado para que pueda seguir elaborando chicharrón de cerdo, ya que es con esta actividad con lo cual genera mas utilidad.
Ella lo mejor que hace es cocinar así que entre sus sueños y metas esta, que en futuro tener un restaurant grande donde ella pueda preparar sus exquisitos platos.
texts.en:
Amanda is 28 years old.  She is married to Alba Jhasmany and the couple have a 10-year-old daughter together.  Their daughter is in elementary school.  Amanda lives in the community of La Maica, south of Cochabamba.  She lives in her parents' home because her house is still being built.  Her parents gave her a plot of land as an inheritance and that is where she is building her home.  Right now the three of them live in just one room where they are all very uncomfortable.  Amanda's main business activity is selling food such as 'chicharrón de cerdo' (seasoned pork ribs cooked in fat and beer) which is a traditional regional dish, as well as duck, rabbit, etc.  She carries out her work every weekend, from Friday to Monday.  Her husband works every day as a taxi driver.  In this way, the two of them work toward finishing the building of their house.

Amanda's previous loan helped her a lot because she was able to use it to buy 10 pigs at a very low price when that opportunity presented itself.  This enabled her to increase her income.  She feels very happy because, with the profits, she managed to make quite a bit of progress in building her house.  This new loan will also be used to buy at least 20 pigs.  This will allow her to have enough in stock so that she can continue making her 'chicharrón de cerdo' as this is the business activity that makes her the most profits. Cooking is what Amanda does best and so her future goals and dreams include owning a large restaurant where she can prepare her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to buy pigs for making 'chicharrón'

loans.name: Jesuwame 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUWAME 1 est composé de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Brigitte Sèdé est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Brigitte Sèdé est âgée de 49 ans et vit au Bénin. Brigitte Sèdé a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Brigitte Sèdé est mariée à un électricien du nom de Isaac et est mère de six enfants, tous scolarisés. Brigitte Sèdé vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple subvient ensemble aux besoins du ménage. Depuis une dizaine d'année, Brigitte Sèdé prépare de la nourriture (riz, pate de maïs accompagné de sauce aux poissons) qu'elle vend dans une école du Bénin. Brigitte Sèdé s'approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Brigitte Sèdé sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe JESUWAME 1, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The JESUWAME 1 group is made up of four people who all live in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Brigitte Sèdé, has her hand raised in the photo. Brigitte Sèdé is 49 years old and lives in Benin. She left school at the primary level. Brigitte Sèdé is married to an electrician named Isaac. She has six children, all of whom go to school. Brigitte Sèdé lives with her husband and children. Together, the couple meets the needs of their household.

For around 10 years, Brigitte Sèdé has made food (rice, corn paste with fish sauce) that she sells in a school in Benin. She obtains her supplies in Benin. In order to satisfy her customers and increase turnover and revenue, Brigitte Sèdé and the other JESUWAME 1 members are asking ALIDé for a sixth loan. The previous loans have all been fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and corn, condiments, and fresh fish.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús de 40 años  de edad inició un negocio en sus tiempos libres, los fines de semana, vendiendo frutas los fines de semana en la puerta de su casa. En la medida en que fue creciendo y viendo su utilidad, despertó n Jesús,  mucho más su interés en hacerlo crecer y le agregó refrescos y productos fritos. Hoy es muy reconocido y toda su clientela pasa a refrescarse  de la sed que produce el incesante sol del caribe y su desempeño es aun mejor, pero su capital de trabajo ante la creciente clientela, se convierte en su principal desafío. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará plátanos para ofrecer patacones rellenos y frutas naturales para hacer refrescos en mayor volumen. Su inversión tendrá éxito, porque tendrá un capital de trabajo para surtir bien su negocio y ofrecer nuevos y diversificados alimentos.
texts.en: Jesus who is 40 years old began his business in his free time, on weekends, selling fruit from the door to his house. To the extent that it was growing and seeing its utility, Jesus' interest in making it grow woke up and he added refreshments and fried products. Today he is well known and all of his customers come by to refresh themselves from the thirst that the incessant Caribbean sun produces. His performance is even better but his working capital, in the face of growing customers, has become his main challenge. This is the reason why he has accessed his CrediKiva, his first loan with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, through which he will buy bananas to offer stuff plantains and natural fruit to make drinks in greater volumes. His investment will be successful because he will have the working capital to stock his business well and offer new and different food.

loans.use: to purchase bananas to offer stuffed plantains and natural fruit to make refreshments.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: La Sra. Rosario tiene 62 años y es viuda, ella se dedica a la confección  de vestidos, buzos y edredones, en su taller que se encuentra en su mismo domicilio, la Sra. Rosario es cliente antigua de la institución ya que esta es su cuarta secuencia, La Sra. Rosario utilizara este préstamo para la  compra de  tela y fibra para la confección de prendas de vestir ya que tiene un pedido que entregar, Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital, la Sra. Rosario enfrenta retos en su negocio que son competencia ya que existe muchos talleres de confección por la su zona, y utilizara  los beneficios del crédito en  mejorar su casa, la Sra. Rosario se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Rosario is 62 years old and widowed. She works making dresses, shirts, and comforters in her shop in her own home. Rosario is an old client of this institution, with this being her fourth loan. Rosario will use this loan to buy fabric and fiber for making clothing, as she has an order to fill. She is asking for this loan to increase her capital. She faces challenges in her business, including competition from the many other sewing shops in her zone. She will use the money she earns from the loan to improve her home. Rosario feels happy and thankful with the institution for the support given her.

loans.use: buy fabric and fiber

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El Sr. Juan tiene 41 años es casado con 3 hijos que son de las edades de las edades de 3, 5 Y 9 años se dedica al servicio de preparación de alimentos al servicio gastronómico el vive en la zona de Alto Tacagua,  este préstamo es su cuarta secuencia dentro de la institución, Juan utilizara este préstamo para la compra de un horno industrial para la elaboración sus platillos en realiza la elaboración de sus comidas a pedido, la  razón para solicitar este préstamo es para incremento de capital de trabajo,  Juan enfrenta retos en su negocio que son aumentar sus ingresos y va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir equipando su cocina, el sr. Juan es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Juan is 41 years old. He is married and has 3 children who are 3, 5, and 9. He is involved in the food service industry. He lives in the zone of 'Alto Tacagua'. This loan is the fourth he has taken out though the institution. He will use the loan to buy an industrial oven to use when preparing dishes and pre-ordered food. The reason he has requested the loan is to be able to increase his working capital. The challenge that he faces in his business is trying to increase his profits. He will use the profits from his business to continue buying equipment for his kitchen. Juan is a very hard worker and he is happy and thankful for the support that the institution provides.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael Antonio de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su familia, el posee un comedor y un pequeño depósito de bebida, es muy conocido en la zona y últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues las comidas que prepara son exquisitas; carnes, sopas, ensaladas etc., además las gaseosas y jugos del depósito son de primera calidad y los vende a precios realmente accesibles; Rafael es un hombre trabajador y muy honrado, siempre dispuesto a superarse, le gusta mantenerse adelante de su competencia, piensa que entre más duro trabaje mayor será su recompensa, quiere ver crecer su negocio y que sea un éxito rotundo, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar bebidas por mayor para el depósito. Rafael Antonio sabe que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar una mejor situación económica.
texts.en: Rafael Antonio, 55 years old, lives with his family. He has a diner and a small drink shop. He is well known in the area and lately has many customers since the food he prepares is delicious: meat, soup, salad, etc. Additionally, the sodas and juices from the store are of the best quality and he sells them at affordable prices. Rafael is a hard-working  and very honorable man, always committed to getting ahead. He likes to stay ahead of the competition. He thinks the harder you work, the greater your reward will be. He wants to see his business grown and be an absolute success. It is for this that he has decided to request from INTEGRAL a loan that allows him to buy drinks at wholesale for the shop. Rafael Antonio knows that in this way he will be able to provide his household with a better economic situation.

loans.use: to buy drinks at wholesale.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité se Denomina “Mujeres Unidas” ya que todas están en busca mejorar su condiciones de vida y así brindarle una mejor condición de vida y nuevas oportunidades a sus familias. El comité se encuentra en el Decimo Sexto Ciclo con 23 integrantes. Cada una con sus respectivas actividades productivas, son muy unidas responsables y solidarias entre ellas.
Norma se dedica a la venta de prendas usadas de todo tipo, comenta que la venta ha ido mejorando gracias a que las personas ven en las prendas de segunda mano una buena alternativa, ya que ella siempre tare muy buenas prendas a muy buen costo. Ella comenta que le gustaría poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma ayudar a su familia.
Acude a la fundación y a Kiva para solicitar un préstamo, el cual desea invertir en la compra de prendas de segunda mano con lo cual podrá tener un buen stock de mercaderías que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group is called “Mujeres Unidas” (United Women) because all are in search of better living conditions and new opportunities for their families.  The group of 23 is in its sixteenth cycle.  Each one has her own productive activities and they are very responsible and united with one-another. 

Norma sells second-hand clothing of all types.  She says that her sales have gotten better, since people see second-hand clothing as a good alternative, and she always offers good clothing at good prices.  She also says that she would like to continue expanding and in this way be able to help her family.

She has approached the foundation and Kiva to request a loan.  She wants to invest the money into second-hand clothing so that she can have a good stock of merchandise to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria es viuda, con hijos, es dueña de Despensa y Carnicería, en su propio local. Según la señora empezó con una pequeña casilla un copetín y ventas de verduras, siempre soñaba de poder tener un local más amplio para poder tener su propia despensa y equipar su carnicería.
Cuenta con muchos clientes lo que cada día le motiva para seguir luchando para salir adelante, es una señora muy honesta trabajadora humilde y por sobre todo muy responsable.
 Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, lácteos, carnes, verduras, hortalizas y demás insumos necesarios para poder surtir su local y de esa forma poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Maria is a widow who has children.  She has a general store and butcher's shop in her own premises.  She says that she started out with a small stall, a fast food business and vegetable sales.  She always dreamed of having larger premises so that she could have her own general store and butcher's shop.

Maria has a lot of customers which motivates her to continue working hard every day in order to make progress.  She is a very honest, unassuming, hard-working woman but, above all, she is very responsible.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy drinks, food, dairy products, meat, greens, vegetables, and other products that she needs to stock her business so that she can continue working.

loans.use: to buy products for her store

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, membre du groupe de crédit Matumaini, jeune femme dynamique, ambitieuse, entrepreneur, âgée de 26 ans, mariée. Elle est  vendeuses des habits. Elle a commencé son business de lors qu’elle  fut informée de micro crédit qu’octroie l’IMF Hekima. Elle fut initié à l’auto prise en charge par sa mère. Ainsi, elle bénéficia son premier crédit de 50$ pour démarrer ses affaires. Elle expose ses articles dans les camps de militaires auprès de ses pairs, tantôt au marché public de Katindo.  Son mari est un officier militaire. Les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et d’appui à la scolarité de ses  enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  15eme  crédit. Au cours de la période, cette cliente a vu ses affaires prospèrent positivement. Ainsi elle a  décidé d’augmenter son montant de crédit pour ce cycle. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  30 pièces de pagnes.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et ouvrir ses horizons en ouvrant un magasin.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
The client, a young, dynamic and ambitious entrepreneur, is 26 years old and married. She is a member of the Matumaini borrowing group. She sells clothes. She began this business when she heard about the micro loans available from MFI Hekima. Her mother showed her how to become independent. She began her business with a first loan of $50. She displays her items in the military camps among her peers, as well as at the Katindo public market.  Her husband is a military officer. 

With the profit, she is able to save, buy food and support her children's education. However, she has just received her fifteenth loan from Hekima. Over time, this client has seen her business thrive in a positive way. For this reason, she decided to increase the loan amount for this cycle. This new loan will allow her to buy 30 pieces of "pagne" fabric.  In addition, she would like to see her children grow up, and expand her horizons by opening a store.  Sasangelo is grateful to Hekima for helping poor women excluded from traditional banks to become independent.

loans.use: to buy 30 pieces of "pagne" (colorful African cloth).

loans.name: Adela

texts.es: Adela de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella posee una pupusería en donde vende en gran variedad, revueltas, queso, frijol con queso, de camaron, cangrejo, entre otros. Últimamente ha aumentado su demanda pues su platillo típico es exquisito, preparado con material de primera calidad y a precio accesible, además el servicio es excelente; Adela es una mujer activa, emprendedora siempre dispuesta a trabajar duro para lograr sus objetivos, piensa que hay que verse como ganador para poder actuar como uno, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles, verduras etc. Adela tiene la esperanza que poco a poco podrá obtener una mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Adela is 50 years old and lives with her children in a home of her own.  She has a pupusa shop (pupusas are thick stuffed tortillas) where she sells many stuffed with cheese, beans and cheese, shrimp, and crab, among other things.  Lately the demand has increased, since her typical dish is delicious, made with first class ingredients, and sold at a good price.  Besides, the service is excellent.

Adela is an active, enterprising lady, always ready to work hard to reach her goals.  She believes that one must see oneself as a winner in order to act as one.  This brought her to request a loan through INTEGRAL, so that she could buy dried corn, cheese, pork rinds, beans, vegetables, etc.  Adela has hopes that she will be able to obtain a better life for her family little by little.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Isabelita

texts.en: Isabelita is 75 years old and married.  She has three children.  They live in the small village of Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines.  Isabelita's family is doing well despite the hardships that they are experiencing.  She is engaged in this kind of business merely to help and support her tricycle driver husband earn a living.  She is in the retail business, locally known as a 'sari-sari' store.  She has been in this business for three years and has a proven track record of being able to generate revenue.  In fact, she has a return every month of PHP 1,900.  She joined GDMPC to gain financial access that will allow her to engage in further business activities and expand her business.  She is requesting a loan of PHP 2,600 to purchase supplementary grocery goods to sell in the store.  She is hoping that through her income, she can further support the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods to sell in her store.

loans.name: Donatin Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DONATIN est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la sixième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Bernadette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Bernadette est âgée de 35 ans et vit au Bénin. Bernadette a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Bernadette est mariée à un certain Félix. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés. Bernadette vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer ses diverses charges, Bernadette vend depuis cinq ans de l’akassa (pâte à base de maïs) et divers produits à son domicile de façon secondaire. Bernadette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Bernadette sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DONATIN, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The Donatin group is composed of three people living in the same neighborhood. It is the sixth time that the group is seeking financial support from ALIDé, in order to expand their business. The group’s representative, by the name of Bernadette, is the one raising her hand in the photo. Bernadette is 35 years old and lives in Benin. Bernadette stopped her formal education at the primary school level. Her husband’s name is Felix. They have two children, both in school. Bernadette lives together with her husband and children and, jointly with her husband, provides for various household needs. In order to cover her expenses, for five years Bernadette has been selling “akassa” (a thick cornmeal porridge) out of her home and also, as a secondary activity, other miscellaneous items. With the goal of meeting customer needs and increasing her sales volume and her revenues, Bernadette, together with the other members of the Donatin group, is seeking her sixth loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy bags of corn and miscellanous items.

loans.name: María Pilar

texts.es: María Pilar de sesenta y uno años de edad vive en casa propia, vive sóla, ya que sus hijos se fueron de casa hacer sus propia familia y su esposo fallecio hace pocos años, ella posee una venta de ropa, camisas, vestidos, pantalones, faldas entre otros , todo lo vende desde su residencia y de forma ambulante, en pueblos cerca del municipio donde vive, es muy conocida y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues es una excelente vendedora, todo lo que comercia es de excelente calidad y a precio muy accesible además el servicio es inigualable; María a pesar de su avanzada edad es una a mujer muy entregada al trabajo, siempre se encuentra muy activa y con ganas de seguir superándose, piensa que no hay peor lucha que la que no se hace, quiere luchar por su negocio, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. María Pilar tiene fe que así se dará la posibilidad de seguir teniendo una vida digna.
texts.en:
María Pilar is 61 years old and lives in her own house. She lives alone, as her children have left the home to raise their own families, and her husband passed away a few years ago. 

She sells clothing such as shirts, dresses, pants, skirts, and other items. She sells everything from her home, and door to door in towns near the municipality where she lives. She is very well-known and has acquired many customers, as she is an excellent salesperson, and everything she sells is of excellent quality and priced affordably--and as well, the service is unmatched.  

Despite the fact she is older, María is a woman who is very devoted to work; she is always very energetic, and eager to keep improving herself. She believes that there is nothing worse than not trying. She wants to work very hard for the sake of her business, and that is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy clothing at wholesale. María Pilar has faith that in this way, she will give herself a chance to continue having a decent life.

loans.use: To buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Marneth

texts.en:
This is Marneth, 38, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines who is married to Rafael, a driver, and a mother to her children. She manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Marneth operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, Php 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Marneth is requesting a Php 20,000 loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands.

Marneth hopes to be able to expand soon, and dreams of giving her children a good and high quality education through all of her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es: Blanca Luz de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo, Ella posee una venta de ropa en su residencia y de forma ambulante, la vende en variedad para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene vestidos, pantalones, camisetas, trajes entre otros, en estos últimos días ha aumentado el número de sus clientes que compran ropa de playa, dado se acerca la epoca de verano y además lo que comercía es de muy buena calidad y a precios bajos, Blanca se caracteriza por su amabilidad; es una mujer trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que nuestra responsabilidad es crear un canal parar  poder llegar a nuestro destino y así tratar de hacerlo más fácil, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar Ropa por mayor. Blanca Luz tiene la esperanza que así su familia podrá lograr un mejor futuro
texts.en:
Blanca Luz is 46, and lives with her life companion and her son. She sells clothing from her home, and door-to-door. She sells a variety of items for ladies, men and children. 

She has dresses, pants, T-shirts, suits and other items. Lately the number of her customers who buy beachwear has increased, given that summertime is approaching. In addition, what she sells is of very good quality and well-priced. 

Blanca is known for her friendliness; she is a hard-working woman who is very eager to succeed. She believes that our responsibility is to create a channel to reach our destiny, and this way achieve it more easily. 

This is how she decided to apply to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy clothing at wholesale. Blanca Luz hopes that in this way her family will be able to attain a better future.

loans.use: To buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Rina Ivonne

texts.es: Rina Ivonne vive junto a su familia un una zona muy concurrida de personas, es de ahí donde le surgió la idea del negocio que posee, una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, es muy conocido en la zona pues ahí las personas encuentran todo lo que necesitan, ya que es la tienda más surtida, vende granos básicos, bebidas, golosinas, pan entre otros, además todo lo vende a precios muy accesibles a sus clientes; Rina es una mujer muy trabajadora dispuesta a cumplir todos sus objetivos, sus vecinos se refieren muy bien de ella; piensa que hay que hacer lo mejor que se pueda para cumplir el éxito y siempre llegar hasta el final, es así como se decide a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas etc. Rina Ivonne tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rina Ivonne lives together with her family in a very busy area.  That is where she got the idea for the business that she has.  Her business is a store where she sells basic needs items.  It is well-known in the area because people find everything they need there.  Hers is the best stocked store.  She sells basic grains, drinks, sweets, and bread, among others.  Also, she sells everything at very accessible prices to her customers.

Rina is a very hard-working woman who is prepared to reach all of her objectives.  Her neighbors speak very highly of her.  She thinks that you need to do the best that you can in order to be successful and always reach the finish line.  

That is how she decided to request a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy basic grains, sweets, bread, instant products, and drinks, etc.

Rina Ivonne has faith that she will be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, bread, instant products, and drinks.

loans.name: Josseline Rosalia

texts.es:
Josseline es una joven de 20 años, madre de un pequeño de 1 añito al cual adora con todo su corazón y el cual la hace reír solo con verlo cuando ella se siente triste, a pesar de su corta edad Josseline nos cuenta que es su mejor motivación y el mejor regalo que dios le puede dar, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad conocida por sus Dunas, las cuales son visitadas por infinidad de turistas en todo el año al igual que la laguna de “Huacachina”, así como también se cultiva uno de los mejores algodones del mundo y el cultivo de espárragos. En su tiempo libre Josseline disfruta de escuchar música al lado de su pequeño, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Lomo saltado”; ella tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar secretariado ejecutivo.

Día a día Josseline trabaja en su negocio de venta de cortinas, sabanas, cubrecamas, toallas y manteles, trabaja alrededor de 5 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene a Dios y a su pequeño hijo al lado y es su mejor motivación para salir adelante.

Josseline está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería al por mayor y así mejorar sus ingresos y tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, así seguirá trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una tienda de ropa”.
texts.en:
Josseline, 20, is the mother of a little one-year-old who she adores with all her heart and who whenever she’s sad makes her laugh by just looking at him.  Despite her young age, Josseline tells us that he’s her greatest motivation and the best gift God could have given her.  Her house is located in the city of Ica, a city known for its sand dunes which are visited by numberless tourists all year round as well as Huacachina Lagoon; it’s also known as the place where one of the world’s best cotton is grown and for growing asparagus.  In her free time Josseline enjoys listening to music alongside her little one.  She also likes to eat one of her favorite dishes, the very delicious “Lomo Saltado.”  She attended secondary school but would have liked to have studied to become an executive secretary.

Day to day Josseline works in her business selling curtains, sheets, bedspreads, towels and tablecloths. She works about 5 hours a day and can tend to up to 20 customers daily.  She believes that she does well in her business because she has God and her little son by her side and he’s her best motivation to get ahead.

Josseline is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given her she will buy more merchandise at wholesale to improve her income and have a wider variety of goods available to offer customers to continue working day by day to make her greatest dream a reality: “To have a clothing store.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Delmy Rosibel

texts.es: Delmy Rosibel de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su familia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, cereales, huevos, bebidas entre otros,  su negocio es muy conocido en la zona puesto todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios reamente accesible  además el servicio es bueno ya que Delmy es una excelente vendedora; su negocio es relativamente nuevo y ella a visto muy buenos frutos de las ganancias y siendo ella una mujer laboriosa con grandes metas a futuro, piensa que experimentar los desafíos son una gran oportunidad para crecer es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito de que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, bebidas, aceite, golosinas, etc. para hacer crecer su negocio. Delmy  Rosibel tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una vida digna.
texts.en:
Delmy Rosibel is 42, and lives with her family. She owns a store where she sells basic household necessities such as staple grains, cereals, eggs, drinks and other products. Her business is very well-known in the area, because everything she sells is very good quality and priced very affordably. Besides, the service is good, as Delmy is an excellent salesperson.

Her business is relatively new, and she has seen very good profits. As she is a hard-working woman with big goals for the future, she believes that experiencing the challenges is a great opportunity to grow.  

That is why she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy staple grains, instant products, drinks, cooking oil, candy, etc. to make her business grow. Delmy Rosibel is confident that in this way she will be able to give her family a decent life.

loans.use: To buy staple grains, instant products, drinks, cooking oil and candy.

loans.name: Nareit

texts.en: Nareit, 30, is married, and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running the business of buying tamarind fruit and cashew nut to resell for over three years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about USD 3 per day. In order to improve her family’s economy, Nareit is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase rice to resell. By doing so, she would be able to earn more money to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business, build a new house and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase rice to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk products.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 28 years old and lives in Naga, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is single with no dependents. 

Marivic has a general store that sells groceries.  She has had this business for one year. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase more stock for her grocery store.

Marivic has been a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her grocery store.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married with two children. Virginia is 58 years old and lives in San Roque, Panaon, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

Virginia is a farm owner and grows coconut to earn a living. She has been doing this for 15 years. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase fertilizers and coconut seeds.

Virginia has been a member of PMPC for almost eight years. In the future, Virginia hopes to purchase additional parcels of coconut land.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and coconut seeds

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business making ice cream in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her ice cream making business.

Jasmin has been in this business for two years. Jasmin earns more income from her sari-sari store.

Jasmin has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is married and has three children. She is 52 years old and lives in Dela Paz, Panaon, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.
