Francisca is a farm owner and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for twenty years. She has requested a loan to be used for purchasing fertilizers and sprays for her rice production activity. 

Francisca has been a member of PMPC for almost eight years. In the future, she hopes to purchase additional parcels of rice land.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and sprays for her rice production activity.

loans.name: Crispa

texts.en:
This is Crispa, 62, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. She is already a widow. She manages her household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Crispa operates a salon business. She offers hair styling, hair grooming, manicure and pedicure, and other salon services. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 1,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy supplies for her salon like shampoo, hair treatment creams and oils, and other things needed for her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Crispa dreams of growing her business and maintaining her good health in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stock of salon products needed in her business.

loans.name: Neriza

texts.en: Neriza lives in Cabungaan Clarin in Misamis Occidental. She is 36 years old, married, and has four children. To make a living, Neriza raises crops, particularly corn and bananas. Neriza has been in business for seven years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2009, Neriza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Neriza is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue to pay the tuition fees of her children and save for any future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Von

texts.en: Von, 43, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops and breeding pigs for over five years, earning approximately USD 8 per day. Two of her children are employed in the garment factory. They earn approximately USD 10 per day. In order to improve her family’s living conditions, Von is requesting a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase fodder for breeding her pigs. In the future, she would like to expand her pig farm and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide convenient living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase fodder for her pigs

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 62 years old and lives in Nailon, Tudela Misamis Occidental. She is married and blessed with five adult age children. Her husband is a pensioner. She established her own small business to help her husband generate income for the family. Nenita works in the agricultural business, raising domestic pigs for sale commercially. She has been active in this business for 19 years and has generated a good return to date. She has had a return monthly in the amount of PHP 5,200.

Recently she joined GDMPC and applied for a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase feed for the pigs' growth and good nourishment. She plans that in the near future, a portion of the income generated will be reinvested into the business for expansion.

loans.use: to purchase feed

loans.name: Macaria

texts.es:
Macaria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de chicha que es una bebida a base de maiz,la socia vende la chicha en un local desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de chicha.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos para comprar maiz,jora y azucar al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Macarie continues to dedícate herself to the business of selling “chicha”, which is a corn based drink.  She sells chicha at a site from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 pm.

Her dream is to expand her business of selling chica.  She is requesting the loan to buy supplies.  She will buy wholesale corn, “jora” (corn that is specially prepared for making chicha), and sugar.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, “jora” (corn that is specially prepared for making chicha), and sugar.

loans.name: Jelyn

texts.en:
Jelyn is a married and has a child. She is 25 years old and resides at Caluya, Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Jelyn owns and operates a banana plantation for a living. She has been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns PHP 7,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. 

In 2010, Jelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Jelyn wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Norania

texts.en:
This is Norania, 34, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. She is married to Arnel, her business partner, and she is mother to their seven children. She, together with her husband, manages the household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Norania operates a buy and sell business. What she basically does is buy general merchandise from wholesalers and sells them for a little profit. Her products are pants, clothes and other similar products. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices and the many options she offers.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 1,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy RTW products and merchandise to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Norania hopes to be able to expand her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for merchandise and RTW products to sell

loans.name: Adannoudé Paulin

texts.fr: Adannoudé Paulin est âgée de 46 ans et vit au Bénin. Adannoudé Paulin est marié à une marchande du nom de Emilienne. Adannoudé Paulin a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire et a appris ensuite la mécanique. Le couple a sept enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés. En dehors de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Adannoudé Paulin et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Adannoudé Paulin exerce le métier de mécanicien depuis vingt trois ans environs. A côté de cette activité, Adannoudé Paulin vend des pièces de rechange et des bois de chauffage. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Adannoudé Paulin désire rehausser le niveau de son activité par l'acquisition de pièces détachées et de bois de chauffage ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Adannoudé Paulin sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Adannoudé Paulin is 46-years-old and lives in Benin. He is married to a merchant by the name of Emilienne. He halted his studies in secondary school and then learned how to be a mechanic. The couple have seven children, some of whom are in school. Besides their children, the couple have another child to support. Adannoudé Paulin and his wife jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered. 

To cope with his different expenses, Adannoudé Paulin has worked as a mechanic for about twenty years. Aside from this work, he sells spare parts and firewood. This work enables him to meet the needs of his children and to support himself. 

He would like to boost his business by acquiring spare parts and firewood, which will allow him to respond effectively to the requirements of his customers. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from ALIDé for a third time. The first two loans were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and firewood

loans.name: Bessy Lorena

texts.es: Bessy Lorena de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive con su hija a quien con mucho esfuerzo esta por darle la oportunidad de estudiar en la Universidad. Ella posee una venta de tortillas sobre calle principal del lugar de su residencia es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela  pues sus tortillas son las más ricas y calientitas, además el precio es bajo, también manda a vender frescos y gaseosas a los autobuses que pasan frente a su negocio; Bessy es una mujer trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene muchas metas a futuro y espera poder cumplirlas, es una mujer con una fortaleza indomable y gracias a la cual la vida ha recompensado dando lo necesario para su subsistencia y la de su familia, decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y sodas. Bessy Lorena tiene la esperanza que así logrará una mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Bessy Lorena is 49 years old and lives with her daughter. With a lot of effort, she is going to be able to give her the opportunity to study at the university. She has a shop selling tortillas on a main street (where her home is) that is very well known and she has gotten a lot of customers because her tortillas are very tasty and warm. She also sells them for a low price and sells juices and soft drinks to the buses that pass in front of her business. Bessy is a hardworking woman with a lot of desire to get ahead. She has a lot of goals for the future and hopes to make them happen. She is a woman with unbeatable strength, which has thankfully made her life go well for her, giving her everything she and her family need.

She decided to ask Integral for a loan to allow her to buy soft drinks and corn in bulk. Bessy Lorena hopes that this will allow her family to have a better life.

loans.use: buy soft drinks and corn in bulk

loans.name: Bedetha

texts.en:
Bedetha lives in Santa Cruz, Tangub City. She is 31 years old and blessed with two children. Her husband is a government employee. 

She decided to buy a motorcycle for transport to support her husband in finding ways to earn an income. She earns through providing transportation in the community. Bedetha has been in this business for four years. In the years of having this business the inflows were great and she was able to earn PHP 6,500 a month. Bedetha also has another line of business, selling "okay-okay" or used clothes.

Earlier she joined GDMPC to seek financial assistance. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 PHP to purchase spare parts for the motor transport business. Some of this loan amount will be invested in her "okay-okay" business. 

Bedetha hopes that from the income generated she will be able to grow and sustain her business and reinvest back into the business a portion of the profit earned. Additionally, she hopes to improve the living situation of the family for better lives.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the motorcycle transport business and use part of this loan to invest in her "okay-okay" business.

location.town: Santa Cruz, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Jewel Group

texts.en: Daylinda. a 35-year-old married mother of three children, lives in Upper Lumbia, Pagadian City where she has been selling food and snacks to earn a living for almost five years, earning about PHP 9000 each month. A member of PMPC for almost four years, Daylinda is requesting a loan of PHP 14900 to purchase raw ingredients for her snack-vending business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her snack-vending business.

loans.name: Segesse De Bor De Mere Group

texts.fr:
Meniau est le coordinatrice de son groupe SEGESSE DE BOR-DE-MER. Meniau habite dans la région de  SEGESSE DE BOR-DE-MER, d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Il a dirigé son  commerce de  Moto   pendant 10 années.  Avant de commencer ce commerce, il était un professeur

Meniau voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans moto. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres  militant  ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces.

Meniau dit que ses défis principal est deveniez une grande commerçant. Meniau dit que son but principal et son rêve est possède une  gros  Business avec sa propre fond avec la mercy de Dieu.
texts.en:
Meniau is the coordinator of his group SEGESSE DE BOR-DE-MER. Meniau lives in the SEGESSE DE BOR-DE-MER region of Haiti, where electricity is rare and water very limited. He has directed his motorcycle business for 10 years. Before starting this business, he was a teacher.

Meniau would like to use this loan to invest in motorcycles. He hopes that this loan will help him to enlarge his business. The other active members need loans for such businesses. 

Meniau says that his principal challenge is to become a big businessman. Meniau says that his main goal and his dream is to have a big business with his own funds with God's mercy.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts.

loans.name: Lamara

texts.ru:
Ламара занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом на протяжении 20 лет. В деревне Шишкерт Ламара разводит крупный рогатый скот, овец, пчел и кур. Также она выращивает овощи и фрукты. Полученную на ферме сельскохозяйственную продукцию: говядину, баранину, молоко, мед, яйца, овечью шерсть, овощи и фрукты Ламара сдает в магазины города Капана и таким образом содержит семью. 
Ламаре 49 лет, она проживает в деревне Шишкерт, Сьюникского региона. Ламара  окончила пищевой техникум, но не успела устроиться на работу, так как вышла замуж и родила троих детей. Дочери Ламары уже замужем и живут отдельно от родителей, а сын недавно вернулся из армии и сейчас помогает матери на ферме. Муж Ламары работает на гидроэлектростанции машинистом, а, в свободное от работы время, помогает Ламаре в ведении сельскохозяйственного бизнеса. 
Ламаре необходим кредит на сумму 1.000.000 для покупки нескольких поросят для своей фермы, нескольких новых ульев, рамок для меда и парафина. Также Ламара намеревается приобрести новый сорт картофеля для посева.
texts.en:
Lamara has been involved in agriculture for 20 years.  She breeds cattle, sheep, and keeps bees and chickens in the Shishkert village.  She also grows vegetables and fruits.  Lamara sells the agricultural products, such as beef, lamb, milk, honey, eggs, wool, vegetables and fruits, obtained from her farm, to stores in the city of Kapan and, thus, supports her family. 
Lamara is 49 years old and lives in the Shishkert village of the Syunik region.  She graduated from a nutrition college, but was unable to get a job because she got married and had three children.  Lamara's daughters are already married and live separately from the parents, and her son recently returned from the army, and now helps his mother on the farm.  Lamara's husband works as a machinist at a hydropower station and helps Lamara to run the agricultural business in his free time.  
Lamara needs a loan in the amount of 1,000,000 dram to purchase several piglets for her farm, several new beehives, and frames for honey and wax.  Lamara also intends to purchase a new variety of potato for sowing.

loans.use: to buy several piglets for her farm, beehives, frames for honey and wax, and also a new variety of potato for sowing

loans.name: Mech

texts.en: Mech, 51, is married and resides with her husband and seven children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running the business of grinding rice for over two years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is a carpenter who earns about USD 8 per day. In order to improve her husband’s business, Mech is requesting for a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase timbers to use in her husband’s carpentry work. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it stronger to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase timber

loans.name: Enawagnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ENAWAGNON est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La  représentante du groupe, du nom de Eugénie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Eugénie est âgée de 44 ans et vit au Bénin. Eugénie n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Eugénie est mariée à un décorateur du nom de Félix et est mère de quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés. Eugénie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la famille.  Afin de contribuer aux diverses charges de la famille, Eugénie vend depuis dix huit ans, de la nourriture (pâte de maïs, de farine de manioc, accompagnée de sauce de moutons) dans son quartier. Eugénie s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Eugénie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ENAWAGNON, un septième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The ENAWAGNON group consists of three people who all live in the same neighborhood. The leader of the group is called Eugénie and is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Eugénie is 44 years old and lives in Benin. Eugenie did not go to school. Eugénie is married to a decorator called Félix and is a mother to four children, several of whom attend school. Eugénie lives together with her husband and her children. The couple cover all the family expenses together. In order to contribute to the various family expenses, for the past eighteen years, Eugénie has been selling food (maize dough, cassava flour and mutton sauce) in her neighborhood. Eugénie gets her supplies from a region of Benin. In order to satisfy her customers and increase her revenue and income, Eugénie is requesting, together with the other members of the group ENAWAGNON, her seventh loan from ALIDé. All previous loans have been repaid.

loans.use: To buy bags of maize, cassava flour and mutton.

loans.name: Jesukpego 14 Group

texts.fr: JESUKPEGO 14 est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Catherine (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgé de 46 ans. Catherine est mariée à un certain Mariano. Le couple a cinq enfants à charge, dont trois sont leurs propres enfants. Tous les enfants du couple sont scolarisés. Catherine vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure ensemble avec son mari les charges de la maison. Catherine n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Catherine mène comme activité la vente de céréales et de façon secondaire la vente de la bouillie faite à base de mil et de sucre à son domicile depuis une quinzaine d'année. Catherine s’approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses et de se faire plus de profit, Catherine sollicite, ensemble avec les autres  membres du groupe JESUKPEGO 14, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les  crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: JESUKPEGO 14 is a group consisting of three people who all live in the same neighbourhood. The leader of the group is called Catherine and is 46 years old (she is raising her hand in the photo). Catherine is married to Mariano. The couple take care of five children, three of whom are their own. All the children go to school. Catherine lives with her children and her husband and together with her husband takes care of the household expenses. Catherine did not go to school. In order to cover the various expenses, over the past fifteen years Catherine has been running a business from her home selling grain as well as a porridge made from millet and sugar. Catherine gets her supplies from a town in Benin. In order to better meet the growing number of customer demands and to increase her profits, Catherine is requesting, together with the other members of the group JESUKPEGO 14, a third loan from ALIDé. All previous loans have been repaid.

loans.use: To buy maize, millet and sugar.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 48 years old and lives in San Roque, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with seven children.
 
Evelyn has a hog fattening business and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more feed for her pig business. 

Evelyn has been a member of PMPC for almost eight years. In the future, Evelyn hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more feed for her pigs

loans.name: Djromahuton 13 Group

texts.fr: DJROMAHUTON 13 est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Kouwadinou Marcelline (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgé de 38 ans. Kouwadinou Marcelline est mariée à un certain Bruno. Le couple a un enfant scolarisé et à leur charge.Kouwadinou Marcelline vit ensemble avec son enfant et son mari et assure ensemble avec son mari les charges de la maison. Kouwadinou Marcelline a très peu fréquenté l’école, mais a appris la coiffure, une activité qu'elle mène passionnément depuis une dizaine d'année et qui lui permet de contribuer aux dépenses du ménage. Parallèlement à cette activité, Kouwadinou Marcelline vend des mèches et des lubrifiants dans son atelier. Kouwadinou Marcelline s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses et de se faire plus de profit, Kouwadinou Marcelline sollicite, ensemble avec les autres  membres du groupe DJROMAHUTON 13 un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: DJROMAHUTON 13 is a group consisting of three people who are all friends and live in the same neighborhood. The leader of the group is called Kowadinou Marcelline and is 38 years old (she is raising her hand in the photo). Kouwadinou Marcelline is married to Bruno. The couple has one child who attends school in their care. Kouwadinou Marcelline lives with her child and her husband and covers the household expenses together with her husband. Kouwadinou Marcelline has very little schooling, but learned hairdressing, an activity that she has pursued with passion for around twelve years and that allows her to contribute to the household expenses. Besides this activity, Marcelline Kouwadinou sells hair extensions and lubricants from her workshop. Marcelline Kouwadinou gets her supplies in Benin. In order to better meet the growing number of customer demands and to increase her profits, Kouwadinou Marcelline is requesting, together with the other members of the group DJROMAHUTON 13, a third loan from ALIDé. All previous loans have been repaid.

loans.use: To buy hair extensions and lubricants

loans.name: Dieu Seul Suffit Group

texts.fr: DIEU SEUL SUFFIT est un groupe de trois personnes dont les membres appartiennent à une même église. La représentante du groupe, Justine Vidjannagny (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 40 ans. Justine Vidjannagny est mariée à un certain Daniel et a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Justine Vidjannagny vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Justine Vidjannagny n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges,  Justine Vidjannagny vend depuis une dizaine d’années, des condiments à son domicile et aussi dans un marché du Bénin. Justine Vidjannagny s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue élargir son activité, Justine Vidjannagny sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DIEU SEUL SUFFIT. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: DIEU SEUL SUFFIT is a group consisting of three people whose members all belong to the same church. The leader of the group is called Justine Vidjannagny and is 40 years old (she is raising her hand in the photo). Justine Vidjannagny is married to Daniel and has four children in her care, some of whom attend school. Justine Vidjannagny lives with her husband and children. The couple takes care of all the various household expenses. Justine Vidjannagny did not go to school. To cover her various expenses, Justine Vidjannagny has been selling condiments from her home and also in a market in Benin for around twelve years. Justine Vidjannagny gets her supplies from a region of Benin. In order to satisfy her customers and with the aim of expanding her business, Justine Vidjannagny is requesting her third loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the group DIEU SEUL SUFFIT. This loan will help her better meet the demands of her customers and increase profits. All previous loans have been repaid.

loans.use: To buy condiments

loans.name: Kifouli

texts.fr: Kifouli est âgée de 43 ans et vit au Bénin. Kifouli est marié à une marchande du nom de Rosine. Kifouli a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire et a appris ensuite la mécanique. Le couple a cinq enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés. En dehors de leurs enfants, le couple a deux autres enfants à leur charge. Kifouli et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Kifouli exerce le métier de mécanicien depuis vingt quatre ans environs. A côté de cette activité, Kifouli vend des pièces de rechange et des lubrifiants. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Kifouli désire rehausser le niveau de son activité par l'acquisition de pièces détachées et de lubrifiants ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Kifouli sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Kifouli is 43 years old and lives in Benin. Kifouli is married to a trader named Rosine. Kifouli left school at primary level and then learned to be a mechanic. The couple has five children, some of whom are in school. In addition to their own children, the couple also takes care of two other children. Kifouli and his wife cover the various household expenses together. In order to take care of the various expenses, Kifouli has been working as a mechanic for around twenty four years. Besides this activity, Kifouli also sells spare parts and lubricants. This activity allows him to meet the needs of his children and satisfy their needs. Kifouli would like to increase the level of his business by purchasing spare parts and lubricants, which will enable him to effectively meet the needs of his customers. For this reason, Kifouli is requesting his third loan from ALIDé. The first two loans have been repaid.

loans.use: To buy spare parts and lubricants

loans.name: Banco Mujer Luz De Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Doña Ana es la presidenta de Banco Mujer Luz de Esperanza, de 45 años, madre de 6 hijos, sin embargo actualmente viven con ella solo 2 , una de 16 años, uno de 8, y su esposo. 

Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, se dedica a la cría y engorde de cerdos, y ven en los préstamos de Fundación  Mujer una oportunidad de salir adelante y una gran ayuda para las microempresarias de este grupo. 

Este es el segundo crédito que solicita y va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, concentrados, vitaminas y desparasitantes. 

Como una buena líder, Ana tiene bien definidas sus metas, una de ellas es crecer lo suficiente como tener una producción grande de cerdos, y que principalmente que por medio del Banco Mujer, todas las socias puedan ayudarse mutuamente, trabajar en grupo y ser solidarias.  

Es importante aclarar que este grupo iniclamente estaba compuesto por 9 socias, justificando así que aparecen tres mujeres adicionales en la foto, sin embargo ellas decidieron formar su propio grupo de 3 socias, quedando solamente 6 integrantes que van a invertir en actividades agropecuarias.
texts.en:
Ana is the president of the 'Luz de Esperanza' (Light of Hope) Women's Bank.  She is 45 years old and the mother of six children though she currently only lives with two of them: a daughter of 18 and a son who is 8.  She also lives with her husband.

Ana is a very hard-working woman who raises and fattens pigs for a living.  She sees Fundación Mujer's loans as an opportunity to make progress and considers them to be a great help for the micro-businesswomen in her group.

This is the second loan that Ana has requested and she will invest it in buying pigs, concentrated feed, vitamins and antiparasitics.

As a good leader, Ana has well-defined goals, one of which is to grow her business so that she has a large production of pigs.  Another of her main goals is for all the members of her group to help each other, work as a team and be supportive of each other through their Women's Bank.

It is important to note that this group initially had 9 clients, which is why there are three extra women in the photo. However, those three women decided to form their own group, so only 6 women will be investing in agricultural activities.

loans.use: to buy pigs, concentrated feed and vitamins

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлане 40 лет, замужем, воспитывает сына. Светлана работает медсестрой в Доме ребенка и в качестве дополнительного дохода -  с 2007 года занимается полеводством. Начав посадку кукурузы  со стартовой суммы 20,000 сом (KGS), на сегодня этот бизнес позволяет иметь стабильный доход семье Светланы в сезон. Также, в хозяйстве Светланы имеется  1 дойная корова, доходы от продажи молока позволяют покрыть ежедневные расходы семьи.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Светлана обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп семян кукурузы и горюче-смазочных материалов.  Доходы от кредита Светлана планирует частично вложить в ремонт дома, а в дальнейшем - в увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Svetlana is 40 years old, married and raising a son.  She works as a nurse at an orphanage and, to provide additional income, has been involved in animal husbandry since 2007.  Started with planting corn and an initial sum of 20,000 som (KGS), today this business allows Svetlana's family to have a stable income during the season.  Her business also has one dairy cow, and the earnings from sales of milk allow Svetlana to cover the family's daily expenses.  In order to further develop her business, Svetlana requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy corn seeds and fuel.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan partially into repairing her house and into expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fuel

loans.name: Mariste Group

texts.en:
Mariste is 38 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. 

Mariste has an RTW buy and sell business and earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to be used for purchasing additional ready to wear clothing business.
 
Mariste has been a member of PMPC for almost a year. In the future, Mariste hopes to open her own RTW store. Mariste is the leader of a two-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

loans.use: To purchase additional Ready to Wear clothing

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is from the village of Dalingap, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 32 years old. Mary Jane is married and has three school-aged children. During our recent visit to her business site "farm corn" located at her own place of residence, she explained that the KIVA loan she took out, with the help of GATA DAKU MPC, has allowed her to have a good harvest. Additionally, Mary Jane's success has enabled her to care for and educate her three children. Mary Jane is very grateful for your support. 

Recently she requested a loan in the amount of PHP 10,000 for her other line of business, a general store locally known as a "sari-sari store". The amount requested will be used to purchase more grocery goods to sell. Doing these kinds of businesses is of great help in the family. The return is good enough to sustain their daily needs. Furthermore, with this business she was able to earn 7,460 PHP a month. She has been engaged in these business for about three years.

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано жительница города Вахдат. Она занимается шитьем национальных платьев. В этой области она 15 лет. Ей 50 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она берет кредит для покупки швейной машинки.
texts.en: Rano is a resident of the city of Vahdat.  She is involved in sewing national dresses and has been in this business for 15 years.  Rano is 50 years old, married and has three children.  She is requesting this loan to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Pedro Guadalupe

texts.es: Pedro Guadalupe de treinta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. El posee un molino y es muy conocido en la zona, ha aumentado la demanda pues a la clientela le gusta moler el maíz, frijol, yuca semillas como de cacao, horchata, arroz, salsas y otros, en su molino ya que  el servicio y los precios son excelentes; Pedro es un hombre muy trabajador, le gusta aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, tiene muchos sueños que quiere cumplir y piensa que solo con voluntad y perseverancia los podrá alcanzar, uno de ellos es ver crecer su negocio, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita hacer reparaciones en el molino y comprar repuestos como fajas, discos y aceites. Pedro Guadalupe tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una vida más prospera.
texts.en:
Pedro Guadalupe is 31, and lives with his life companion and their children. He has a mill, and is very well-known in the area. Demand has increased as his customers like to grind corn, beans, yuca, cocoa beans, seeds for making horchata (traditional beverage), rice, sauces and other things in his mill. This is because the service and prices are excellent. 

Pedro is a very hard-working man; he likes to take advantage of all opportunities that arise. He has many dreams he wants to fulfill, and believes that only through will and perseverance will he be able to realize them. 

One of them is to see his business grow; that is why he decided to apply to Integral for a loan that will allow him to do repairs on his mill, and buy spare parts and supplies such as belts, disks, and oils. Pedro Guadalupe is confident that in this way he will be able to give his family a more prosperous life.

loans.use: To pay for repairs to his mill, and buy parts and supplies such as belts, disks, and oils.

loans.name: John Alex

texts.es:
John es un hombre de 32 años, que tiene un pequeño dijo de apenas 1 añitos de edad, su esposa es la que vela día a día por su bebé para que siempre se encuentre en buen estado de salud. Esta péquela familia vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú.

Actualmente John se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte, el labora en este tipo de trabajo aproximadamente un promedio de 10 horas diarias, sabe que hay muchas personas que desean transportarse y es necesario brindar este tipo de servicio.

Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, John desea reparar su auto debido a que tienen unas cuantas fallas y también tramitar el título universitario de su esposa. Con este apoyo el podrá hacer que su auto se encuentre en mejores condiciones y que su esposa pueda laborar en la profesión que tiene. Esto les permitirá tener más ingresos y desde ya empezar a construir su propia casa juntos.
texts.en:
John is a 32 year old man who has a small son just 1 year old.  His wife is the one who watches over their son day by day so that he stays healthy.  This small family lives in Parcona District, Ica, Perú.

Currently John makes his living providing transportation services.  He works approximately 10 hours a day.  He knows that many people want get around, and that the service he offers is needed.

With the help of the Kiva lenders, John hopes to repair his auto, since it has a few problems, and also to process his wife's college degree.  With this help, John will be able to get his auto into better condition and to get his wife into her profession.  All of which will allow them a greater income and from there, they will be able to start building their own house together.

loans.use: with repairs to his auto and to process his wife's college degree.

loans.name: Murtazo

texts.ru: Муртазо проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Муртазо занимается скотоводством. Он в основном разводит быков у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности он занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Murtazo lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 33 years old, married and has two children.  Murtazo is involved in animal husbandry.  He primarily breeds cattle at home.  He has been in this business for ten years.  Murtazo is requesting this loan to purchase bulls.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Jurabek

texts.ru: Чурабек проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. Чурабек восемь лет как занимается растениеводством. Он берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Jurabek lives in the Hamadoni district.  He is 38 years old, married.  Jurabek has been involved in agriculture for eight years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 42 years old and lives in Colupan, Bajo, Sinacaban. Evelyn is single with no children.

Evelyn has a general store where she sells a variety of products. Evelyn has had this business for eight years. Evelyn requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Evelyn has been a member of PMPC for seven years.  In the future, Evelyn hopes to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Samphors

texts.en: Samphors, twenty-five, is married and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling clothes for over three years, earning approximately USD 4 per day.  Her husband is a garment worker who earns about USD 3 per day.  In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Samphors is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase a sewing machine to sew fashionable clothes to sell.  By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support the family.  In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to sew fashionable clothes to sell.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is married with two children. Leonila is 55 years old and lives in Nacional, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.

To earn a living, Leonila has a vulcanizing and radiator repair shop business. She has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns approximately PHP 7,000. She requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase materials and accessories used in vulcanizing and radiator repair. She has been a member of PMPC for almost six years.

In the future, Leonila hopes to establish another shop.

loans.use: To pay for the materials and accessories used in vulcanizing and radiator repair

loans.name: Dorca Isabel

texts.es: Dorca Isabel de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su hija; ella posee una tortillería muy conocida en el lugar, últimamente se ha aumentado la demanda pues su negocio se caracteriza por ser el servicio más rápido además las tortillas son ricas, calientitas y las vende a un precio muy accesible; Dorca es una mujer muy carismática siempre se encuentra con una sonrisa en el rostro, dispuesta a trabajar, tiene muchos sueños que quiere alcanzar y uno de ellos es ver crecer su negocio y sabe que solo con mucha perseverancia y responsabilidad logrará llegar al éxito, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano. Dorca Isabel tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Dorca Isabel is 25 years old and lives with her daughter.  She has a tortilla-making business that is well known in the area.  Demand has increased lately because her business is known for having the fastest service.  Also, the tortillas are delicious and warm, and she sells them at a very affordable price.

Dorca is a very charismatic woman.  She always has a smile on her face and is ready to work.  She has a lot of dreams she wants to realize, and one of them is to see her business grow.  She knows that only with a lot of perseverance and responsibility will she manage to achieve success.

This is how she decided to ask Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy corn wholesale and propane gas.

Dorca Isabel has faith that she will be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale and propane gas.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is 51 years old and lives in Silongon, Tudela. Regina is married with one child.
 
To earn a living, Regina has a business selling snacks in the local community. Regina earns about PHP 1,000 each month doing this type of work. 

Regina has requested a loan of 2,000 PHP to purchase additional ingredients such as sugar, oil, butter, flour, etc.

Regina has been a member of PMPC for two years.  In the future, Regina would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients such as sugar, oil, butter, flour,etc.

loans.name: Linly Group

texts.en:
Linly, a married mother of two children, is 25 years old and lives in the Philippines where she has been a farmer growing assorted crops to earn a living for the past two years. A member of PMPC for two years, she is requesting a loan of PHP 8000 to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Linly is the leader of a two-person group. Although borrowing as a group, each member has her own business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and farm supplies.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en: Analiza is 24 years old and presently lives in Guitran, Dumingag, Zamboanga del sur. She is married with three (3) children. She has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for one (1) year. She requested a loan for her hog-fattening business. Analiza hopes that someday she can earn more than the needs of her family through the help of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and may God bless all of this.

loans.use: To purchase more feed for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics, creams, perfumes, handbags, and sandals.

loans.name: Batzorig

texts.en: Batzorig is a 47-year-old man who lives with his wife and two kids in Govisumber province in Southern Mongolia. His two children are in college and high school. He has been running a food cart business since 1998 with his wife. His wife helps him to cook and prepare the food. He meets 3 trains a day and sells 50 dumplings and 3 boiled dinners at one time. The business is the only economic source for them to feed their family members and pay for the childrens' tuition fees. Batzorig is a diligent guy who has a broad plan to make the business bigger and says that "I would like to buy some supplies for my business. Also my mother sick and she needs to be treated." The total amount he is requesting is 600,000 MNT to pay for his mother's treatment costs.

loans.use: To pay for his mother's treatment costs.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en: Nenita is from Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is 61 years old and married. Nenita has only one grown dependent. Nenita owns and operates a restaurant to support her day-to-day needs. For six years, she has been able to manage the restaurant properly. Every month she receives PHP 5,160 from her business undertakings. To pave her financial difficulty, Nenita joined GDMPC in 2012. The cooperative gives her the chance to access financial services. As a matter of fact, she already has drawn one loan, making this current loan application her second. Her loan this time is for PHP 7,000. This will be used to buy ingredients for cooking viands to sell in her mini-restaurant. With the probable revenue to gain, Nenita hopes to sustain her livelihood and sell more products to increase the regular monthly income she receives.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for cooking viands to sell

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de verduras,la socia vende cebollas,zanahorias,lechugas y tomates,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,ella vende en el mercado,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras.La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como tomates,cebollas,zanahorias y lechugas al por mayor.


La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is still working in the business of selling vegetables.  She sells onions, carrots, lettuce and tomatoes from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm in the market.  Through this business, the member supports her children.  Her dream is to expand her vegetable selling business.  She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, carrots and lettuce in bulk.

The member is grateful for the loan requested and agrees to comply with payment of her dues on time.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, carrots and lettuce in bulk.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is from the village of Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She is fifty-six years old and has five adult children. Her husband is a farmer. 

Lolita has a business in the agricultural sector planting and harvesting bananas.  Lolita'a primary source of income comes from planting and harvesting bananas.  She decided to engage in this business because it gives her a good return. She sells the bananas to her contract buyers in the market.  She has a net income of PHP 2,800 per month from these activities.  

Lolita joined GDMPC to gain financial assistance to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.  She applied for a loan of PHP 4,700 to purchase fertilizers for her bananas. With the revenue generated, Lolita will expand her banana farm so that she can double her income.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her banana farm.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is married with three children. Margarita is 41 years old and lives in Carmen, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.

Margarita sells snacks to earn a living and has had this business for two years. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business. 

Margarita has been a member of PMPC just this year.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
This is Evangeline, 49, who is a resident of Taguig city, Philippines. She is married to John Carlo, her business partner, and she is a mother to her four children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Evangeline operates a food stall. In the Philippines, the whole working community and most of the families only eat home-cooked meals during evenings where all of the family members are at home to take part in the meal. This is not only a usual family tradition but a matter of convenience and frugal living. It is considered a waste of money and time to spend cooking gas and food for one to two persons when buying cooked rice and viands cost less than raw food. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Evangeline dreams of being able to give her all her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work in her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients and products

loans.name: Mennie

texts.en:
Mennie is married with seven children. Mennie is 37 years old and lives in Pinig, Dumalinao ZDS.

Mennie has a general store to earn a living and has had this business for four years. Each month, she earns PHP 6,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Mennie has been a member of PMPC for almost one year.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en:
Lucila is married with one child. Lucila is 59 years old and lives in Brgy. Señor, Sinacaban.

Lucila is a farmer and grows corn crops to earn a living. Lucila has been doing this for six years. Lucila has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase additional fertilizers such as inorganic and commercial fertilizers.
 
Lucila has been a member of PMPC for seven years. In the future, Lucila hopes to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizers such as inorganic and commercial fertilizers

loans.name: Tokpanou Albert

texts.fr: Tokpanou Albert vit au Bénin. Tokpanou Albert est marié à une marchande du nom de Gentille. Tokpanou Albert a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire et a appris ensuite la mécanique. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Tokpanou Albert et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Tokpanou Albert exerce le métier de mécanicien depuis dix huit ans environs. A côté de cette activité, Tokpanou Albert vend des pièces de rechange. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Tokpanou Albert désire rehausser le niveau de son activité par l'acquisition de pièces détachées ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Tokpanou Albert sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Tokpanou Albert lives in Bénin. He is married to Gentille who is a tradeswoman. Tokpanou Albert completed primary school and then learned to be a mechanic. The couple has three children, some of whom are still in school. He and his wife are responsible for the various household expenses. In order to manage all the expenses, Tokpanou Albert has been a mechanic for about 18 years now. As a side business, he also sells spare parts. The business allows him to take care of his family's needs and his own. Tokpanou Albert would like to strengthen his business by purchasing spare parts for resale, which will help him properly respond to client demand. This is why Tokpanou Albert is requesting his third loan from ALIDé. The two previous loans were both properly repaid.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Dansou Dominique

texts.fr: Dansou Dominique est âgé de 40 ans et vit au Bénin. Dansou Dominique est marié à une couturière du nom de Geneviève. Dansou Dominique a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire et a appris ensuite la mécanique. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. En dehors de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Dansou Dominique et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Dansou Dominique exerce le métier de mécanicien depuis dix huit ans environs. A côté de cette activité, Dansou Dominique vend des pièces de rechange. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Dansou Dominique désire rehausser le niveau de son activité par l'acquisition de pièces détachées ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Dansou Dominique sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Dansou Dominique is 40 years old and lives in Bénin. Dansou Dominique is married to a tailor named Geneviève. He completed primary school and then studied to be a mechanic. The couple has four children, some of whom are still in school. Along with their own children, they also take care of another child. Dansou Dominique and his wife are responsible for the various household expenses. To manage all the expenses, Dansou Dominique has been a mechanic now for about 18 years. As a side business, Dansou Dominique also sells spare parts. The business has allowed him to take care of his family's needs as well as his own. Dansou Dominique would like to strengthen his business by purchasing spare parts for resale, which will help him effectively respond to client demand. This is why Dansou Dominique has requested his third loan from ALIDé. The two former loans were both properly reimbursed.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase shoes.

loans.name: Yaquelin

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el seuño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz,azucar,leche,aceite y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues with her grocery store selling rice, sugar, milk and cookies.  She works from 8am until 5pm and is able to support her children through this business.  Her dream is to expand the grocery store.  She’s asking for the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, oil and cookies at wholesale.  
She is happy about the loan and committed to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, oil and cookies at wholesale.

loans.name: Carlos Giurgelt

texts.es: Carlos Glurgelt tiene 24 años de edad, su negocio es una panadería que este negocio lo aprendió de los padres que ellos iniciaron el negocio  y ahora él se encarga de la panadería.  Carlos Glurgelt toda la vida ha trabajado en este negocio y la experiencia que tiene le ha permitido brindar un producto de calidad y un excelente servicio, además realiza entrega de su producto a los negocios que le realiza los pedido. Carlos está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más producto para la elaboración del pan, el comprara harina, manteca, levadura, mantequilla, huevos, vainilla entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Carlos Glurgelt is 24 years old.  His business is a bakery, a business he learned from his parents who started the business and now he’s in charge of it.  Carlos Glurgelt has worked in this business his entire life and the experience he’s attained has allowed him to provide quality products and excellent service; besides he delivers his products to businesses that place orders.  

Carlos is asking for financing to buy more ingredients to make bread.  He will buy flour, shortening, yeast, butter, eggs and vanilla among others.

loans.use: to buy flour, shortening, yeast, butter, eggs and vanilla, among others.

loans.name: Zinsou Isidor

texts.fr: Zinsou Isidor est âgé de 42 ans et vit au Bénin. Zinsou Isidor est marié à une coiffeuse du nom de Eliane. Zinsou Isidor a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire et a appris ensuite la mécanique. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. En dehors de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Zinsou Isidor et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Zinsou Isidor exerce le métier de mécanicien depuis dix huit ans environs. A côté de cette activité, Zinsou Isidor vend des lubrifiants et des graisses. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Zinsou Isidor s'approvisionne au Nigéria. Zinsou Isidor désire rehausser le niveau de son activité par l'acquisition de lubrifiants et de graisses ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Zinsou Isidor sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Zinsou Isidor is 42 years old and lives in Benin. He is married to a hairdresser by the name of Eliane. He halted his studies in secondary school and then learned how to be a mechanic. The couple have four children, who are all in their care. Aside from their children, the couple have another child to support. 

Zinsou Isidor and his wife jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are met. To cope with his difference expenses, he has been working as a mechanic for about eighteen years. Aside from this work, he sells lubricants and greases. This work enables him to meet the needs of his children and to support himself.  He gets his supplies from Nigeria. 

Zinsou Isidor  wishes to boost his business by acquiring lubricants and greases, which will allow him to respond effectively to his customers. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from ALIDé for the third time. The first two loan were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy lubricants and greases

loans.name: Marta Lilian

texts.es: Marta Lilian de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una pupusería en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona por elaborar las pupusas más exquisitas y en variedad hay revueltas, de queso, de frijol con queso, entre otras, últimamente aumento la demanda pues saben que están hechas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es especial hay una sonrisa para cada cliente que la visita; Marta es una mujer muy trabajadora digna de admirar, quiere cumplir muchas metas y una de ellas es ver crecer su negocio, piensa que sus más grandes secretos para intentar lograrlo  son el amor y la voluntad de trabajar, ya tiene experiencia crediticia,  por eso volvio a decidir  solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles etc. Marta tiene la fe que así podrá darle un mejor futuro a su familia y seguridad económica para su hogar.
texts.en:
Marta Lilian, 55, lives with her spouse and children.  She has a pupusa shop [grilled stuffed corn cakes] at home and is very well-known in her area for making the most exquisite pupusas in several varieties like revueltas [mixed ingredients stuffing], cheese and bean with cheese among others.  Demand increased lately because they know that they are made with first quality ingredients and are priced affordably.  Besides, service is special; there’s a smile for each customer that visits.

Marta is a very hardworking woman that’s worthy of admiration.  She has many goals to reach and one of them is to grow in business.  She believes that one of her greatest secrets to attempt to reach it is love and the willingness to work.  

She has credit history so has once again decided to ask Integral for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy corn, cheese, fried pork, beans, etc.  Marta trusts that she will be able to give her family a better future and economic security for her home.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, fried pork skin and beans.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr:
Afi est une femme âgée de 39 ans. Elle est mariée å un pasteur. Elle a 3 enfants, dont 2 à l’école. Le premier a 12 ans et le dernier a 2 ans.
Afi travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1994. Elle vend des pagnes et charbon de bois pour tous clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir satisfaire toutes les demandes.
Afi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des sacs de charbon de bois et des pagnes. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Afi voudrait augmenter son fonds de roulement. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Afi is a 39-years-old woman who is married to a pastor. She has three children, of whom two are in school. The first child is 12 years old, and the last, 2. 

Afi has been working as a retailer since 1994. She sells <i>pagnes<i/> (colorful West African cloth) and charcoal to all comers to her home. She purchases the goods in Lomé. She works alone. At the moment, her main difficulty is not being able to meet the demand fully. 

Afi has requested her first loan from WAGES to buy sacks of charcoal and some <i>pagne<i/> cloth. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the next few years, Afi would like to increase her working capital. She says she plans on using the profits to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy traditional cloth and sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Erasmo

texts.es: Erasmo de 28  años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar. El se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado de engorde. Con mucha dedicación mantiene  su ganado  en buenas condiciones los cuales vende una vez tengan el tamaño y peso adecuado. Es así como se  gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingresos. Él es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos   ya que con el tiempo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada vez lo prefieren mas. Su sueño es poder dar a su querida familia  mejores oportunidades de vida  a las que tienen ya que viven en condiciones muy humildes que no les permiten poder accesar a una mejor calidad de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de terneros de engorde para criarlos y ponerlos a la venta y poder mejorar sus ingresos que le permitan poder dar a su familia las condiciones adecuadas que conlleven a mejorar sus oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Erasmo, 28, lives in a house that’s his property with his family group.  He is a farmer and raises cattle to fatten up.  He keeps his cattle in good condition with much dedication and once they reach adequate size and weight he sells them.  This is how he earns his livelihood and provides daily bread for his home.  This activity is his main source of income.  

He is a very hardworking, responsible man who has good references from his neighbors since he’s managed to win over the trust of many people who prefer him more and more each time.  His dream is to be able to give his beloved family better life opportunities than they currently have since they live in very humble conditions that do not allow for access to a better quality of life.

He’s made the decision to ask Integral for this loan to buy calves to fatten up and raise in order to put them up for sale and be able to improve his income in order to provide his family with conditions that are adequate and bring with them better life opportunities.

loans.use: to buy calves to fatten up.

loans.name: Fati

texts.fr:
Fati est une femme âgée de 32 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur de friperie. Elle a 2 enfants qui vont à l’école. Le premier a 10 ans et le dernier a 7 ans.
Fati travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2004. Elle vend des fruits pour tous clients au marché. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Fati a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des fruits. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Fati voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Fati is a 32-years-old woman who is married to a vendor of used clothing. She has two children, who go to school. The first child is 10 years old, and the last, 7. 

Fati has been working as a retailer since 2004. She sells fruit to all comers at the market. She purchases the goods in Lomé. She works alone. At the moment, her main difficulty is an inventory shortage. 

Fati has requested her third loan from WAGES to buy some fruit. She wants to reinvest in her business. 

In the next few years, Fati would like to expand her business. She says she plans on using the profits to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Akuegnon Group

texts.fr: AKUEGNON est un groupe composé de six personnes qui sont des amies. La représentante du groupe du nom de Salimatou Alakè (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 42 ans. Salimatou Alakè est mariée à un transitaire du nom de Claude. Le couple a un enfant qui est scolarisé et qui est à leur charge. Salimatou Alakè vit ensemble avec son enfant et son mari et assure ensemble avec son mari les charges de la maison. Salimatou Alakè a arrêté l'école au niveau secondaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Salimatou Alakè mène comme activité la vente de produits congelés, de liqueurs, de canettes et des tissus de façon secondaire. Il y a trois ans que Salimatou Alakè exerce cette activité. Salimatou Alakè s’approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses et de se faire plus de profit, Salimatou Alakè sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AKUEGNON, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
AKUEGNON is a group composed of six persons who are friends. The group's representative, Salimatou Alakè (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 42 years old and married to a shipping agent by the name of Claude. They have one child who is in school and in their care. Salimatou Alakè lives together with her child and husband and jointly ensures with her husband that the household expenses are covered. 

Salimatou Alakè halted her studies in secondary school. To cope with her different expenses, she has a business selling frozen foods, liquor, canned soft drinks, and cloth secondarily. She has been in this business for three years. She gets her supplies from a city in Benin. 

With the goal of responding better to the requirements of her burgeoning customer base and making more profit, Salimatou Alakè is requesting, along with the other members of the group AKUEGNON, an initial loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods, liquor, and cloth.

loans.name: Vania Elizabeth

texts.es: Vania Elizabeth habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por sus abuelos, dos hijos y una sobrina. Ella se dedica a la venta de diferentes productos dentro de su  mini bazar el cual ha logrado establecer dentro de su hogar de residencia. Ofrece variedad de artículos tales como: cosméticos, prendas de vestir, juguetes, papelería, ropa para bebe, etc.  Es una mujer increíble la cual se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable y sobre todo emprendedora. Ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para sacar adelante a su querida familia la cual cada día le demandan más.  Su negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos dado que es la única que trabaja para llevar el pan da cada día a la hogar. Para ella lo más importante es que su familia cuente con los recursos necesarios para sobrevivir. Todo esto es lo que la impulsa a seguir trabajando duramente para no descuidar su trabajo y seguir percibiendo los beneficio de su mini bazar, los cuales hasta el momento son los que han permitido llevar a su familia a flote. Cuenta con algunos clientes fijos que la prefieren por ser una mujer ejemplar, que con su carisma y duro trabajo ha sabido llevar a su familia y a su negocio adelante. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de artículos tales como: prendas de vestir, cosméticos, juguetes, etc. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL ya que  no cuenta con los ingresos necesarios para hacerlo por su cuenta. El objetivo es surtir su negocio de variedad de artículos que logren atraer a más clientes  que permitan aumentar las ventas e ingresos y pueda lograr el sueño de su vida de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.  Vale la pena aclarar que está profundamente agradecida con INTEGRAL dado que en el pasado le brindaron la mano con otro préstamo que solicito para invertir en su negocio y que el mismo vaya creciendo.
texts.en:
Vania Elizabeth lives in a house that’s hers with her family group which is composed of her grandparents, two children and a niece.  She sells various products in her mini-store that she’s managed to set up at home.  She sells a variety of items like cosmetics, articles of clothing, shoes, stationery goods, baby clothes, etc.  

She is an incredible woman who stands out for being hardworking, responsible and above all enterprising.  She has worked for a long time to move her family, who daily demand more from her, forward.  Her business is her main source of income since she’s the only one that works to bring daily bread home.  For her, the most important thing is that her family has the necessary resources to survive.  This is what pushes her to continue working hard in order not to neglect her work and continue earning profits in her mini store which to date have been what’s allowed her to keep her family afloat.  She has some regular customers who prefer her because she’s an exemplary woman who has known how to support her family and move her business forward with her charisma and hard work.

She has decided to invest in her business buying a variety of things like: articles of clothing, cosmetics, toys, etc.  This is the reason why she’s asking Integral for a loan since she does not have the necessary income to do it on her own.  The objective is to stock her business with a variety of items that will attract more customers so that sales and income will increase and she can reach her dream of providing her family with better living conditions.

It’s worth stressing that she is profoundly grateful to Integral because they extended a hand to her previously with another loan she requested to invest in the business so that it can grow.

loans.use: to buy clothes, toys, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Kpemahuton 02 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement KPEMAHUTON 02 est composé de douze personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de Pauline est celle ayant une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupement sollicite pour une troisième fois l'appui financier de ALIDé. Pauline n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Pauline est âgée de 43 ans et est mariée à un certain Pamphile. Le couple a six enfants, mais aucun n'est scolarisé. Pour contribuer aux divers besoins de sa famille, Pauline vend depuis quinze ans, des ustensiles de cuisine par le système de distribution. Pauline s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et de mieux satisfaire leur clientèle, Pauline et les autres membres du groupement KPEMAHUTON 02 sollicitent un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Leur ambition est d’accroître le niveau de leur activité.Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group "KPEMAHUTON 02" comprises twelve persons who reside in the same district. The group's representative, Pauline, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. With the goal of boosting their business to cope better with the demands of their customers, this group is requesting financial aid from ALIDé for the third time. 

Pauline never attended school. She is 43 years old and married to a man named Pamphile. They have six children, but none of the children are in school. To help with the diverse needs of her family, Pauline has been selling kitchen utensils for fifteen years via the distribution system. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

With the goal of bolstering their business and further satisfying their customers, Pauline and the other members of the group KPEMAHUTON 02 are requesting a third loan from ALIDé. Their ambition is to increase their level of business. The previous loans were indeed repaid.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils

loans.name: Felipe Antonio

texts.es: Felipe Antonio de 59 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos en especial maíz y frijoles.  De esta forma brinda lo necesario a su familia.  Después de cultivar la cosecha pone  a la venta cierta parte de los granos básicos y otra la deja para consumo de su familia.  Esta es su principal fuente de ingresos. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él ya que a pesar de su avanzada edad sigue trabajando y no se cansa de hacerlo.  Cada día siente que las necesidades de su hogar son mayores por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL  de tal manera que por medio de la ayuda de esta institución pueda comprar los insumos necesarios (semillas, abonos, venenos para plagas, etc.) para seguir cultivando los granos básicos que son los que le permiten dar a su familia el pan de cada día. Espera y confía en Dios todo poderoso que obtendrá resultados positivos y logrará su sueño de brindar a su querida familia mejores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Felipe Antonio, 59, lives in his own house with his spouse and four children.  He farms basic grains, corn and beans especially.  He provides his family with the basics this way.  After harvesting he sells part of the basic grains and leaves the rest for his family’s consumption.  This is his main source of income.  Many people give him good references.  Despite his advanced age he continues to work and does not tire to do so.  

Every day he feels that his home’s needs are greater so he’s decided to ask Integral for a loan so that through help from this institution he will be able to buy needed supplies (seeds, manure, bug killers, etc.) to continue farming basic grains which is what allows him to provide his family’s daily bread.  He hopes and trusts in God Almighty that he’ll obtain positive results and reach his dream of providing his beloved family with better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, bug killers, etc.

loans.name: Noemy Esther

texts.es: Noemy Esther de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda en el lugar de su residencia donde vende productos de primera necesidad frijoles, arroz, huevos, leche, azúcar entre otros, todo de primera calidad y a precios bajos además el servicio es inigualable; Noemy es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora se levanta desde muy temprano a atender su negocio pues no le gusta decepcionar a su clientela es por eso que se mantiene adelante de la competencia, piensa que al escalar una montaña muy alta, descubrirá que hay muchas más por alcanzar es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones etc. Noemy Esther tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y seguridad económica para el hogar.
texts.en: Noemy Esther is 39 and lives with her life partner and children.  She has a store located at home where she sells basic necessity products such as beans, rice, eggs, milk, sugar and others, everything she sells is of great quality, sold at low prices and the service is uncomparable; Noemy is an entreprenurial and hard working woman she gets up very early in the morning to work on her business because she doesn't like to dissapoint her clients and that's why she stays ahead of the competition.  She thinks that once a person gets to the top of a mountain they will discover that there are many more to climb; this is why she requests a loan to INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy basic grains, candy, products for instant preparation, drinks, soaps, etc.  Noemy Esther trusts that this way she will be able to provide for her family a better quality of life and financial security for her home.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, products for instant preparation, drinks, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Ana Mirian

texts.es: Ana Mirian habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo. Ella se dedica a la comercialización de productos de tienda como son: granos básicos, golosinas, aceite, café, pan dulce y demás artículos que son atractivos para los clientes. Ha trabajado desde hace muchos años por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área. Es muy conocida por muchas personas las cuales dan buenas referencias. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer responsable, trabajadora y sobre todo carismática ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas.
