texts.en: Zeneyda de Jesus has worked for the company Gallo mas Gallo for the last 5 years, as a sales executive. She has shown her responsibility, honesty and dedication at her job and she is requesting a loan in order to study for a Master's degree in teaching. She receives economic support from her husband, who works as a professor at the URACCAN University. They also get income from a property they own. Zeneyda and her husband have two daughters who are the joy of their home and they would like to provide them with the best life possible and raise them in a home full of love. Zenayda's greatest dream is to enjoy good health and for her family to always be close.

loans.use: to pay for her Master's degree.

loans.name: Agatha

texts.en: Agatha is a 34-year-old married woman. She has 2 children. Her husband works as an electrician. Agatha operates an electronics shop and sells her goods in the shop. She's worked in this business for 15 years and was previously employed selling clothes. Her primary customers are local residents. Agatha's other source of income includes rental houses. She describes her greatest business challenge to be theft and her highest monthly expense is school fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Agatha will use the 20,000 KES loan to purchase electronic equipment for sale. Agatha aspires to open a new kiosk in the future. She joined Yehu for its loan products and policies.

loans.use: to purchase electronic equipment for sale.

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
This is Nimfa, 57, who lives in Quezon City, Philippines. She is a widow and a mother to her five children. She earns a living by purchasing scrap garments from a local textile factory, and then selling them for a small profit. Her products are used in making rugs and door mats. Customers are attracted to her business by her low prices and the many options she offers. Her regular customers are rug makers from her local community.  She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 12,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy additional stocks of textiles to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. 

Nimfa hopes this expansion will continue and allow her to provide a good future to her family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from her religion.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stocks of textiles.

loans.name: Alovaddin

texts.ru: Аловаддин житель города Истаравшан. Возраст, 27 лет. Женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Аловаддин занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят и бычков.
texts.en: Alovaddin lives in the town of Istaravshan. 27 years of age, married with one child. His wife is a homemaker. Alovaddin raises livestock. He has been in this business for five years. He is taking out a loan to buy calves and bulls.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Ivonne Cecilia

texts.es: Ivonne Cecilia es una emprendedora que su negocio al que se dedica a la elaboración de comida ya tiene años de experiencia en este negocio que sus cliente están satisfecho por la calidad de comida y el servicio que les brinda a sus clientes. Esta emprendedora ya ha trabajado con Fundación León 2000, durante el crédito que se le brindo ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y sobre todo perseverante con ganas de superación. Actualmente la emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de productos como arroz, frijoles, repollo, aceite, tortillas, plátanos, verduras, bolsas, platos entre otros productos.
texts.en: Ivonne Cecilia is an entrepreneur who has her own catering and cooking business. She has years of experience in this business and many satisfied customers due to the quality of her food and the service she provides. Ivonne Cecilia has worked with Fundación León 2000 before and has proved herself to be a responsible person, eager to get ahead and always persevering. She is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, beans cabbage, oil, tortillas, plantains, vegetables, bags, plates and other products.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, cabbage, oil, tortillas, plantains, vegetables, bags, plates and other products.

loans.name: Maria Myra

texts.en:
This is Myra, who lives in Quezon City, Philippines with her husband Jovy, who is a security guard, and their four children. She earns a living by operating a barbeque stall. She regularly buys pork, meat and chicken entrails that she cooks and sells in the afternoon in a stand near her house. She also sells peanut butter for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and people who live in the local community.  She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 8,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy more meat, pork and other products. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.  

Myra dreams to be able to give all of her children a good and high-quality education through her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from her religion.

 * All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay loans.

loans.use: to buy ingredients needed for her business.

loans.name: Sauda

texts.en: Sauda lives in Uganda with her husband and three children, two of whom are in school. She also runs a business selling charcoal. Sauda has been in this business for five years, and works seven days a week, selling her products from home on a retail basis. She is requesting a loan to buy more bags of charcoal to sell. She also generates additional income by selling milk and water. Her main business challenges include transportation and people who fail to pay their bills. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start selling on a wholesale basis and to own a fully stocked bar. Sauda lives in a home that she owns; she has access to electricity and piped-in water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding her family.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.es:
Jose tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa la cual es su mejor apoyo y su mano derecha en todo lo que él hace, junto a ella tiene 2 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 22 y 16 años, los cuales son su adoración aunque a veces le saquen canas verdes, pero los ama mucho; su vivienda se ubica en el distrito de Santiago, Ica, Perú; este distrito se caracteriza por albergar a varias agroexportadoras, las cuales brindan muchos puestos de trabajo a los pobladores, asimismo se caracteriza por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva y espárragos. En su tiempo libre Jose disfruta de escuchar música y si es criolla mejor, así como también le pide a su esposa que le prepare uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”; el solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Derecho, por ello el lucha para que sus hijos tengan una profesión ´para que sean mejor que él.

Jose tiene su bodega en la cual vende productos de primera necesidad como abarrotes y productos de uso domestico; él se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes en el día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y coqueto con los clientes, por ello siempre compran sus productos.

Jose está muy agradecidos con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como Arroz, azúcar, fideos, enlatados, entre otros; lo que le permitirá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos y asi seguirá trabajando día a día para realizar su gran sueño:” Tener una bodega más grande y incursionar en el negocio de compra y venta de pecanas”.
texts.en:
Jose is 44 years old.  He lives with his wife, who is his main support and right hand person in everything that he does.  He has two children with her, whose ages are 22 and 16.  He adores them, and even though they sometimes make him feel like pulling his hair out, he loves them greatly.  His home is located in the district of Santiago, in Ica, Peru.  This district is characterized by its various agricultural exporters, which provide good employment for its residents.  It is also characterized by agriculture, especially cotton, grapes and asparagus farming.  

In his free time, Jose enjoys listening to music, especially if it is native music, and he also asks his wife to prepare one of his favorite dishes which is the utterly delicious "chicken with rice".  He only studied up through secondary level, but he would have like to have studied Law.  For this reason, he strives to have his children have a profession, so that they can do better than him.

Jose has a store where he sells everyday products such as groceries and domestic products.  He works in his business about nine hours a day, and can serve up to 15 customers a day.  He believes that things are going well for him with his business because he is very friendly and flirtatious with his customers, which is why they always buy his products.

Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help that they have provided him, he is able to purchase more merchandise for his business, such as rice, sugar, noodles, and canned goods, among other things.  This will allow him to offer a greater variety of products for sale, and in this way he will continue to work from one day to the next on realizing his grand dream: "To have a bigger store, and move into the business of buying and selling  pecans."

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (rice, sugar, noodles, canned goods, among other things)

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, married and has three children. Since 2003, he has earned a living by running a cafeteria where he offers different types of food and drinks. He has lots of experience in this field, a good reputation and is well known in his area. He is requesting a loan for $1,800 to purchase a chicken-grilling machine. His goal is to earn more profits so that he has the opportunity to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a chicken-grilling machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a bathroom in his home.

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es: El joven Pablo Antonio de 24 años de edad, se desempeña como asesor pedagogico del Ministerio de Educaciòn desde hace 6 años, solicita  crèdito para comprar una computadora ya que su esposa y el estudian en la universidad y seria de gran utilidad  para su familia ya que se ahorraria tiempo y no gastaria en cyber  para realizar sus trabajos de la universidad, ambos trabajan, no tienen hijos lo que ganan es para sus gastos y para pagar sus compromisos adquiridos, su mayor sueño en la vida es que construir su propia vivienda y seguir estudiando para ser cada dia mejor tanto en lo material como lo espiritual.
texts.en: Pablo Antonio is 24 years old, and he had worked as an educational adviser with the Ministry of Education for six years. He is requesting a loan to purchase a computer because he and his wife are both studying at university. It would be of great use to the family because they could save time and not spend money renting computers in internet cafes to complete their schoolwork. Both Pablo and his wife work, and they do not have children. They use their earnings to cover their expenses and pay for other commitments they have made. His dream in life is to build his own home and continue studying to become better materially and spiritually every day.

loans.use: Purchase a computer

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy con su anterior credikiva, compró carne de res, gallinas criollas, huevos y tambien unvirtió una parte en ropa para damas, interiores y productos de perfumería. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará ropa interior, ropa informal, e insumos para fabricar almuerzos y para tener mayor existencia tambien acondicionará un poco su local pues necesita tenr un ambiente de trabajo confortable y mejor imagen de su negocio. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Que continuen apoyando a las pequeñas empresas para seguir adelante y cumplir con sus objetivos y metas propuestas, ya que con esto están mejorando las condiciones de vida de su nucleo familiar."
texts.en:
With her previous Kiva loan, Lucy purchased meat, local chickens, and eggs, and also invested part of it in women's clothing, underwear and perfumery prodcuts.

She is currently applying for a new Kiva loan, with which she will purchase underwear, informal clothes, and ingredients for making meals for lunch.  She will also improve her premises a bit, which will allow her to have a better existence as she needs to have a comfortable work environment and improve the image of her business.

Her message to the Kiva lenders is the following:  "I hope that they continue to support small businesses in getting ahead and meeting their objectives and  proposed goals, as with this they are improving the living conditions of their family circles."

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making meals for lunch, underwear and informal clothing, and also to improve her premises a little.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en: Laila is from Iraq. She is 40 years old, married and has two children. Since 2000, she has owned a beauty salon where she offers massages, tattooing, pedicures, manicures and hair brushing and cutting. She has a deep understanding of local customers and their needs. Laila also has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding area. She is requesting a $2,700 loan in order to buy a machine for tattooing and a hair dryer. She is aiming to earn more profits in order to provide a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy tattooing machine and a hair dryer.

loans.name: Twunganirane / Cyrkr / Mgnz Group

texts.fr:
Afrodice fait partie du groupe Twunganirane /CYRKR / MGNZ. Il a 42 ans, il est marie avec 6 enfants de 7 ans à 22 ans, dont 6 scolarises. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 an de primaire.

Afrodice est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des semences, des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de solliciter d’autre crédit pour renforcer son agriculture de riz pour être un agriculteur professionnel. Dans les prochaines années, Afrodice voudrait être le premier agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Afrodice is a member of the Twunganirane /CYRKR / MGNZ group. He is 42 years old, married with six children between 7 and 22 years of age, six of whom are in school. His educational level is five years of primary school. 

Afrodice is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy seeds and chemical fertilizers and   pay the cost of labor.

His business strategy is to continue taking out loans in order to strengthen his agricultural business and professionalize the operations. In the years to come, Afrodice would like to become a major rice farmer in his region. Thanks to his revenues, he envisages being able to pay for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds and chemical fertilizers and   pay the cost of labor.

loans.name: Diyaa

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, is married, and has two children.

Diyaa has been an owner of a store since 2009, selling medical materials and medicines. He has a sufficient experience in this field, with a deep understanding of local customers and knowledge about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

Diyaa is requesting a $3000 loan in order to pay the annual rent and to add more goods as materials. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: To pay the annual rent and to add more goods as materials.

loans.name: Rosenie's Group

texts.fr:
Rosenie  est le coordinatrice de son groupe Les Temwens de Ferrier.  Rosenie habite dans la région ferrier Nordest  d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée.

Elle  n'est pas  marié  et  elle  a 2 enfants,  a dirigé son  commerce pendant les 4 dernières années. Rosenie voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à vendre le commerce du produits divers. Elle  espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à pour améliorer son entreprise

Des autres membres de Les Temwens  ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme charbon et produit divers. Rosenie dit que son défi principal est de développer les ventes et développer votre entreprise.
texts.en:
Rosenie is the coordinator of her group Les Temwens of Ferrier. She lives in the area of Ferrier  Nord-Est in Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is in short supply. 

Rosenie is not married, and she has two children. She has been running her business for the last four years. She would like to use this loan to invest in the business of selling various goods. She hopes that this loan will help her to improve her enterprise. 

The other members of Les Temwens have need of a loan for such businesses as selling charcoal and a variety of goods. 

Rosenie says that her main challenge is to increase sales and help her business to grow.

loans.use: to buy various goods, shoes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a 39-year-old married woman. Her husband is employed and he contributes to the family basic needs. 

Fatuma operates a retail shop and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are nearby residents. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expenses are food and health. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

Fatuma will use the loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase bales of wheat flour, maize flour, and rice. Fatuma aspires to open a wholesale shop in the future. She joined Yehu because of its favorable loan products and policies.

loans.use: To purchase bales of wheat flour, maize flour, and rice.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizers and pay for the cost of labor.

loans.name: San Valentin Group

texts.es: Doña Silveria es miembro del Grupo Solidario San Valentín, tiene 60 años de edad, es viuda, y reside en el Barrio Los Laureles, en el Municipio de Tocoa, departamento de Colon. Doña Silveria vive con su nieta de trece años la cual asiste a la escuela y en su tiempo libre le ayuda a doña Silveria atender el negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo para el hogar, el negocio tiene seis años de funcionar, la pulpería la empezó con poco capital pero a medida ha pasado el tiempo a ido creciendo, ahora Doña Silveria en su negocio tiene mas productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, su horario de atención comienza desde las 7:00 am hasta las 8:30 pm. Su ventaja es que tiene muy poca competencia. El préstamo lo necesita para surtir su negocio de más y variados productos como ser: azúcar, leche, arroz, manteca, frijoles, jabón, detergente, productos lácteos, refrescos, churros, dulces, etc. Ella espera que con el apoyo de este préstamo sus ingresos aumenten y así poder sostener a su nieta y también cancelar sus cuotas de forma puntual. Su meta es que su negocio se pueda mantener estable sin la necesidad de tener que solicitar préstamos para poder surtir su pulpería. Es su primer ciclo en FAMA y espera poder cumplir con sus compromisos de pago de forma puntual.
texts.en: Silveria is a member of the San Valentín communal bank. She is 60 years old and a widow. She lives in the Los Laureles neighborhood in the community of Tocoa, department of Colon. Silveria lives with her  thirteen year old granddaughter who goes to school and in her free time helps Silveria attend to the business. She sells products for household consumption. The business has been running for six years. She started it with a little capital but over time it has grown. Now Silveria has more products in her business to offer her customers. She is open from 7:00 am until 8:30 pm. The advantage is that she has very little competition. She needs the loan to stock her business with more and more varied products such as: sugar, milk, rice, lard, beans, soap, detergent, dairy products, drinks, churros, candies, etc. She hopes that with this loan her income will grow and she will be able to support her granddaughter and also make her payments on time. Her goal is to keep her business stable without needing to ask for loans to stock her store. This is her first cycle in FAMA and she hopes to be able to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, lard, salt, beans, and more.

loans.name: Jaime Guy Celestin

texts.fr:
CLIENT AGE DE 41 ANS CÉLIBATAIRE, PÈRE DE 03 ENFANTS DONT L’AGE  EST COMPRIS ENTRE 18 MOIS ET 8 ANS  ET 2 NEVEUX A SA CHARGE.


DEPUIS 3ANS, IL AVAIT ACQUIT  UNE MACHINE A FABRIQUER DES GLACES ,IL A OUVERT UNE  CRÉMERIE,PAR JOUR IL LIVRE LES CRÈMES GLACÉES  D’UNE VALEUR DE 60.000F.SA CLIENTÈLE AUGMENTE DE JOUR EN JOUR CAR IL UTILISE UNE BONNE QUALITÉ DE LAIT.


AVEC CE PRÊT, IL VA ACHETER : 2 SACS DE LAIT DE 50 KILOGRAMMES, 1 SAC DE SUCRE, 2 BOÎTES DE COLORANTS, LES ARÔMES, LES BISCUITS CORNETS, 10 DOUZAINES DE POTS ET 5 DOUZAINE DES CUILLÈRES EN PLASTIQUE.


IL VEUT AMÉLIORER LA QUALITÉ DE SON PRODUIT  AFIN D’AUGMENTER SES REVENUS, ACQUÉRIR UNE MACHINE  QUI FABRIQUE LES CORNETS ET ACHETER UN VÉLO A PÉDALE POUR FAIRE LES LIVRAISONS AUPRÈS DE SES CLIENTS.
 SON OBJECTIF EST DE MODERNISER SON ACTIVITÉ,ACCROITRE SA PRODUCTIVITÉ. 
 EN TANT QUE PÈRE RESPONSABLE  IL COMPTE AMÉLIORER LES CONDITIONS DE VIE DE SA FAMILLE
texts.en:
This borrower is 41 years old. He is single and the father of three children aged 18 months to 8 years old. He also has two nephews in his care. 

Three years ago, he bought an ice cream maker and opened an ice cream parlor. He sells 60,000F worth of ice cream per day and his client base increases daily due to the quality of the milk he uses.

He will use his loan to buy two 50k bags of milk, one bag of sugar, two boxes of food coloring, some flavoring, some ice cream cones, 10 dozen serving bowls, and 5 dozen plastic spoons.

He wants to improve the quality of his products to bolster his income, purchase a cone-making machine, and buy a bicycle to make deliveries. His goal is to modernize his activity and boost his productivity.

A devoted family man, he plans to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, food coloring, stabilizers, flavoring, etc. to make ice cream.

loans.name: Prospero

texts.es:
Prospero tiene 33 años de edad es soltero tiene 1 hijo, vive con la madre , hermanos y el hijo de 2 años de edad en Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

Prospero se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, yuca y naranja , Además se dedica al comercio de naranja.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar los insumos, abonos, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos para los cultivos.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Chillanes y cada 15 días en San miguel.

El sueño es terminar la carrera , sacar el título y crear una agencia de turismo.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la discapacidad física con efectos psicológicos que le afecta. Y la baja de precios en los productos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte el indor, fútbol y la lectura de los libros y disfrutar de las fiestas Jesús del gran poder.
texts.en:
Prospero is 33 years old, single, and the father of a son. He lives with his mother, brothers, and 2-year-old child in Chillanes in Bolivar province. Prospero is a farmer, who grows corn, cassava, and oranges. He also sells oranges.

He is requesting this loan so that he can buy supplies, manure, fertilizers, and weed killers. With this loan he will be able to buy the supplies for planting. He makes his purchases and sales in Chillanes and every two weeks in San Miguel.

His dream is to give up this job, get his degree, and open a tourism agency. His physical handicap and its psychological effects are challenges he faces, along with the fall in prices for his products. In his free time, he likes to play indoor soccer, read books, and enjoy the Jesus the Great Power festivals.

loans.use: to buy supplies, manure, fertilizers, and weed killers.

loans.name: Marta Gilma

texts.es:
Marta es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y gracias a esta cualidad ha podido salir adelante y continuar progresando. Desde hace aproximadamente 4 años se dedica a la preparación de fritos en el frente de su casa, y gracias a esto genera mayores ingresos para su hogar, pues trabaja también como empleada doméstica 2 días a la semana pero su salario no le alcanza para cubrir los gastos necesarios. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, Marta ha podido captar muy buena clientela, por lo que su negocio ha ido creciendo poco a poco y cada vez generando mayores ingresos. Debido a la poca liquidez con la que cuenta actualmente, Marta busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos necesarios para la preparación de sus fritos.

Marta espera que de esta manera sus clientes sigan aumentando, pues podrá ofrecerles una mejor calidad en sus productos. Además, Marta espera que con mayores ingresos pueda ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Marta sueña con tener su negocio ubicado en un local donde pueda atender a sus clientes de una mejor manera y donde pueda tener mayor reconocimiento por parte de las personas de su sector.
texts.en:
Marta is a person who is always characterized as being very hardworking and thanks to this quality she has been able to get ahead and keep progressing. For about 4 years she has worked making fried food in front of her house. Thanks to this, she she generates more income for her home. She also works as a maid 2 days a week, but her salary isn't enough to cover the necessary expenses. Thanks to her products' good quality, Marta has been able to get a good clientele and her business has grown little by little making more income all the time. Due to the low liquidity she has now, Marta is looking for a loan to buy the necessary ingredients to prepare her fried food. 

Marta hopes that in this way his clientele will continue to grow because she can offer them a better quality product. In addition, Marta hopes that with more income she can offer a better quality of life. Marta dreams of having a business in a locale where she can serve her customers better and be better known by the people in her area.

loans.use: to buy the necessary ingredients to make her fried food.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en: Saumu is a 32-year-old married woman. She has one child who is enrolled in school. Her husband works as a farmer. Saumu operates a grocery and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for 14 years. Her primary customers are residents from the area. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality. Her highest monthly expenses are food and health. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Saumu will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy sacks of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and beans. Saumu aspires to open a new kiosk in the future. She joined Yehu for its favorable loan policies.

loans.use: to buy sacks of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and beans.

loans.name: Jorge Alfredo

texts.es:
Jorge Alfredo tiene 18 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.

Jorge se dedica a la  agricultura a la siembra de maíz, cacao, además se dedica al comercio de madera y cría de pollos.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar madera curada y pollos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar la madera para poder realizar los pedidos como mesa, sillas, comedores, sillones. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en san José del Tambo. 

 El sueño es estudiar la carrera en la marina. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte el indor, el fútbol, boly y ver televisión.
texts.en:
Jorge Alfredo, 18, is single, has no children and lives with his parents in Chillanes in the province of Bolivar. 

Jorge is a farmer who sows corn and cocoa, sells wood and raises chickens.

He is requesting this loan to buy cured wood and chickens. With the help of the loan he’ll be able to buy wood to fill the orders he’s received, like table, chairs, dining room tables, sofas. He buys and sells in San José del Tambo. 

His dream is to study for a naval career. In his spare time, he likes to play sports like indoor soccer and volleyball, and watch TV.

loans.use: buy cured wood and chickens.

loans.name: Carmen Del Rocio

texts.es:
Carmen del Rocio tiene 47 años de edad es casada tiene 4 hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en chillanes provincia de Bolívar.

Carmen se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de café, cacao, maíz, además cría cerdos, pollos y a la compra de madera.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar plantas de café, cacao, semillas de maíz, urea, fertilizantes, líquido para la maleza.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en la parroquia san José del tambo  y Mata de cacao. El sueño es mejorar las condiciones de vida para dar el estudio a los hijos, mejorar la producción y tener mayor utilidad en el negocio.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son los factores climáticos y problemas económicos. En el tiempo libre le gusta leer libros, ver televisión, escuchar música y disfrutar de las fistas del carnaval.
texts.en:
Carmen del Rocio is 47 years old, married, and has 4 children. She lives with her husband and children in Chillanes in Bolivar province. Carmen plants coffee, cacao, and corn; she also raises pigs and chickens and purchases wood.

She is requesting this loan so that she can buy coffee plants, cacao, corn seed, urea, fertilizers, and weed killer. She makes her purchases and sales of cacao in San José Del Tambo parish. Her dream is to improve her situation so that she can educate her children and increase her business's production and profits.

The challenges she faces are weather and financial problems. In her free time, she likes to read books, watch television, listen to music, and enjoy the carnival festivals.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants, cacao, corn seed, urea, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: David Elicis

texts.es:
David es un hombre muy humilde y sobre todo luchador que tiene muchas esperanzas en hacer cada día un trabajo mejor para cuidar de su pequeño niño y su esposa, en los últimos años ellos han tenido que esforzarse juntos por su familia, debido a que la ciudad de Ica, Perú, lugar en el que actualmente viven, ha sufrido desastres naturales, tales los terremotos y las lluvias que han sucedido en los últimos meses. Tras estos tiempos de catástrofes, ellos han encontrado poco a poco la solución para mejorar y progresar, es así como David llegó a ahorrar una cantidad de dinero que le permitió empezar a sacar su licencia de conducir.

Ya con su licencia pudo pedirle a una persona que le alquilase su moto taxi diariamente para poder trabajarla y así ganar un poco de dinero para su familia. David se despierta muy temprano pensando en que debe realizar todos los viajes necesarios para que al día siguiente su familia pueda tener los alimentos sobre la mesa, debido a que actualmente existe mucha competencia y es necesario esforzarse siempre un poco más

David se está esforzando mucho y está deseoso de poder independizarse en su pequeño negocio de transporte, es por eso que tiene el sueño de comprarse una moto taxi propia, gracias al apoyo que podemos darle y al pequeño ahorro que ha podido hacer,  podrá pagar la cuota inicial de su propia moto taxi. David siempre se ha demostrado humildad y que puede lograr grandes cosas, es por eso que está muy decidido a mejorar sus ingresos y así esforzándose logrará cumplir su más grande meta y sueño, “Tener su propia casa”.
texts.en:
David is a very humble man who is a fighter and who really hopes to do his job better every day to care for his small son and his wife. In the last few years, they have had to make an effort together as a family, since the city of Ica, Peru, where they live, has suffered natural disasters such as earthquakes and rains in the last few months. After all of these catastrophes, they have found the solution little by little to improve and progress. That is how David was able to save a quantity of money that allowed him to start o get his driver's license.

With his license he was able to ask someone to rent him a motorcycle taxi daily to work with it and earn a little bit of money for his family. David gets up very early planning the trips he has to make so that the next day his family will have food on the table. Right now there is a lot of competition and it is always necessary to work a little harder. 

David is working a lot and wants to become independent with his small transportation business. That's why he dreams of buying his own motorcycle taxi. Thanks to the support we can give him and the small savings he has, he can make the down payment on his own motorcycle taxi. David has always shown humility and he can achieve great things. That is why he has decided to improve his income and with hard work he will be able to achieve his greatest goal and dream: "to have his own house."

loans.use: to make a down payment on his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Kareem

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 48 years old, married, and has six children.

Kareem is a carpenter; in 1999 he opened his own workshop where he makes furniture and bedroom sets. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $3000 loan in order to purchase a woodworking machine. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to purchase a woodworking machine.

loans.name: Zaina

texts.en:
Zaina lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is single and has four children, two of whom are in school.  She doesn’t take care of additional family members Zaina has a business selling banana leaves.  She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Zaina sells her products at the market, retail. Zaina has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bundles of banana leaves  

The main business challenges for Zaina include transportation and defaulters.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start selling wholesale and to build her own house.  Zaina lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bundles of banana leaves

loans.name: Hammoud

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 40 years old, married and has seven children.

Hammoud has been the owner of a store since 2000, selling milk, cheese and dairy products. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $1800 loan in order to make a showcase and to purchase an electrical generator. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to make a showcase and to purchase an electrical generator.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Fatmata.  She is married and has four children aged 18, 16, 11 and 6. In 2007, Fatmata established her clothing business. She began her business because she needed a reliable livelihood. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. 

Fatmata requires a loan in order to purchase more clothing for her business.  In the future, Fatmata plans to open another business place and build her own house.   She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more clothing for her business

loans.name: Salama

texts.en:
Salama is a 25-year-old married woman. She has one child. Her husband's name is Hassan and he works as a boda-boda (motorcycle transport) operator. Salama sells kerosene from home. She's worked in this business for one year. Her primary customers are villagers. Salama's other source of income includes her husband's income. She describes her greatest business challenge to be change in market prices and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Salama will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy more kerosene for sale. Salama aspires to open a petrol station in the future. She joined Yehu for its loan products and policies.

loans.use: to buy more kerosene for sale.

loans.name: Khodeir

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 46 years old, married and has two children.

Khodeir has been the owner of a shop since 2000, selling phones accessories, mobile phones, and rechargeable cards. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $2000 loan in order to purchase an electrical generator, computer and to add more goods. He is aiming to earn more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: In order to purchase an electrical generator, computer and to add more goods.

loans.name: Kareem

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 40 years old, is married, and has two children.

Kareem has been an owner for a store since 2008, selling mobile phones, accessories, and rechargeable cards. He has sufficient experience in this field, with a deep understanding of local customers and knowledge about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting an $1800 loan to renovate his store and to make an aluminum showcase. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to renovate his store and to make an aluminum showcase.

loans.name: Artur

texts.ru:
Артур 4 года занимается продажей запчастей для автомобилей. В том же помещении Артур предоставляет услуги по ремонту автомобиолей. Там же находиться автомойка Артура. 
Запчасти Артур приобретает в Ереване дважды в месяц и продает их в Капане, в своем собственном небольшом магазинчике. 
Магазин Артура находится рядом с междугородней трассой, и услугами магазина, ремнтной мастерской и автомойки Артура пользуются как жители города Капана, так и проезжающие. Благодаря этому у Артура нет недостатка в клиентах. Артур работает до позднего вечера без выходных. С помощью выручки, получаемой от бизнеса Артур содержит свою семью. 
Артуру 37 лет и он проживает в городе Капане. Артур женат, у него две дочри школьного возраста. Также вместе с ними живет мать Артура. Жена Артура домохозяйка, а мать работат в дезинфекционном центре.  
Артуру необходим кредит на сумму 500.000 драм для приобретения большой партии запчастей для своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Artur has been involved in selling spare parts for cars for four years.  He also provides automotive repair services in the same space.  His carwash is also located there.  Artur buys spare parts in Yerevan twice per month and sells them in Kapan at his small store.  Artur's store is located next to a major highway, and the services of his store, repair shop and carwash are used not only by Kapan residents, but by travelers.  Thanks to this, Artur has no shortage of customers.  He works until late in the evenings and without days off.  Artur supports his family with the help of the profit from the business.  
Artur is 37 years old and lives in the city of Kapan.  He is married and has two school-age daughters.  Artur's mother also lives with them.  Artur's wife is a homemaker, and mother works at a disinfection center.  Artur needs a loan in the amount of 500,000 dram to purchase a large inventory of spare parts for his business.

loans.use: to buy a large inventory of spare parts for his business

loans.name: Ravshanjon

texts.ru: Равшанжон 43 – летний женатый мужчина. Он проживает в районе Рудаки. У него трое детей. Он три года как занимается торговлей. У него имеется продуктовый магазин. Он берет кредит для покупки муки, овощей и масла.
texts.en: Ravshanjon is a 43 year-old married man.  He lives in the Rudaki district.  He has three children.  Ravshanjon has been involved in sales for three years and has a food market.  He is requesting this loan to purchase flour, vegetables and oil.

loans.use: to purchase flour, vegetables and oil

loans.name: Pedro Alberto

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre muy entusiasta, tiene 46 años pero el se considera un joven de 20 años, el es el vivo ejemplo de que a pesar de las penas o problemas que nos puedan pasar se debe seguir adelante; hace 5 años el quedo viudo, su esposa tenía una enfermedad y no pudo salvarse, a raíz de ello tuvo que convertirse en madre y padre para su hija, la cual actualmente tiene 26 años y por la cual sale a luchar día a día para darle un buen futuro y para que se sienta orgullosa de él y para demostrarle que con sacrificio todo puede mejorar en la vida; su vivienda y trabajo se ubica en la ciudad de Pisco, en el distrito de San Andrés, es un distrito en el cual se ubica playas hermosas y una de sus actividades principales es la pesca; ocupación a la que se dedica Pedro.

Pedro trabaja de sol a sol en su negocio como pescador, en especial el se dedica a la extracción de mariscos, el se levanta de madrugada para salir con su embarcación, aprendió este oficio desde muy pequeño gracias a las enseñanza de su padre y es así que se animo a ser pescador; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque Dios está siempre con el y tiene un ángel que lo cuida cada día que es su esposa por ello el sale con mucha fe cada día.

Pedro está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento a la compresora de aire y al moto que usa fuera de borda, lo que le permitirá tener una embarcación (bote) más seguro y evitar accidentes que lamentar; así el seguirá trabajando cada día y cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija  y mejorar su calidad de Vida”.
texts.en:
Pedro is a very enthusiastic man of 46 years, though he feels like a 20-year-old. He is a living example that despite the pains and problems than may come our way, you keep going. Five years ago he became a widower. His wife had an illness from which she could not recover. He then became father and mother to his daughter, who is now 26 years old. He struggles every day to provide a better future for her and so that she will be proud of him. He also wants to show her that with sacrifice everyone can improve his life. He lives and works in the city of Pisco in San Andrés district, where the beaches are beautiful. One of the district's principle activities is fishing, which is Pedro's occupation.

Pedro works from morning to night as a fisherman and specializes in catching shellfish. He gets up at dawn to go out in his boat. He learned to fish at a very early age from his father, which encouraged him to become a fisherman. He believes that his business is going well because God is always with him. He also has an angel, his wife, at his side watching him; so he goes out each day with a great deal of faith. 

Pedro is very grateful to the Kiva lenders whose support will let him do maintenance on his on-board air compressor and motor. This will mean his boat will be safer and he can avoid accidents that would be regrettable. He then will keep working each day to achieve his great dream: ”to give his daughter a profession and improve her quality of life."

loans.use: to do maintenance on his on-board air compressor and motor.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 36-year-old married man. He describes himself to be a visionary man. He operates a motor vehicle providing transportation services. He has been involved in this business for three years and employs two staff members. His business is located in a busy town and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy motor vehicle spare parts. Peter's dream and business goal is to expand his business within five years.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Zuhura

texts.en:
Zuhura is a 27-year-old married woman. She has one child who is enrolled in school. Zuhura operates a boutique. She's worked in this business for three years. Her primary customers are villagers. Zuhura's husband also works. 
Her greatest business challenge is market competition and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has both electricity and piped water. Zuhura will use the Kes 30,000 loan to purchase bales of clothes for resale. Zuhura aspires to open another boutique in the future. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 26 year old and married with two children.

Haydar has owned a food market since 2007, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken and fish, and dairy products. He has experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers. He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $1,500 loan in order to purchase a refrigerator and to add more foodstuffs. He hopes to earn more profits to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and to add more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Он очень целеустремленный человек, который старается содержать свою семью в хороших условиях. Его жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 12 лет Баходур занимается ремонтом автомобилей. Он ремонтирует автомобили всех  марок. Баходур хотел бы получить займ для покупки соответствующих оборудований для ремонта автомобилей.
texts.en: Bahodur is a hardworking and conscientious family man.  He is a very goal-oriented peron, who tries to provide good conditions for his family.  His wife is involved in household work.  Bahodur has been involved in repairing cars for over twelve years.  He repairs cars from all manufacturers.  Bahodur wants to obtain this loan to purchase appropriate equipment for repairing cars.

loans.use: to purchase appropriate auto repair equipment

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат проживает в городе Истаравшан. Возраст, 53 года. У нее четверо детей. Она занимается торговлей однотонных материалов. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 12 лет. Кредит берет для закупа однотонных и разноцветных метровых тканей.
texts.en: Muhabbat lives in the city of Istaravshan.  She is 53 years old and has four children.  She is involved in selling monochrome fabrics.  She has been in this business for twelve years.  Muhabbat is reqiesting this loan to purchase monochrome and multi-colored fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase monochrome and multi-colored fabrics

loans.name: Manea

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 40 years old and married with six children.

Manea has owned a shop since 2006, selling men's clothing. He has experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers. He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $2,400 loan in order to renovate and repair his shop walls and floors. He hopes to gain more profit to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to renovate and repair his shop walls and floors.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is a 28-year-old married man. He has two children, one is a year old and the other is five. He describes himself to be patient. Samuel operates a motor vehicle to provide transportation services. He has been involved in this business for six years and employs two people. His business is located in a busy town and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge as stiff competition in the area. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy motor vehicle spare parts. Samuel's business goal is to be a well-established transport provider within five years.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more bags of charcoal for his business.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a 32-year-old married woman. She has three children, all of whom attend school. Her husband's name is Hassan and he is employed. Fatuma operates a business of selling fish from her home. She has worked in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are villagers. 
Fatuma's husband also works. Her greatest business challenge is seasonality and her highest monthly expense is school fees. She owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Fatuma will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase bundles of fish for resale. Fatuma aspires to open a seafood depot in the future. She joined Yehu because of the availability of loan products.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale.

loans.name: Hamed

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, and married with three children, all of whom work.

Hamed has owned a shop since 2002, selling and fixing automotive air conditioning system. He has experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers. He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $1,500 loan in order to purchase AC testing equipment. He hopes to earn more profits to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase AC testing equipment.

loans.name: Indatwa B / Bgrm No 14 Group

texts.fr:
Djumapiri fait partie du groupe Indatwa B /Bgrm NO 14. Il a 63 ans, il est marie avec 8 enfants de 12 ans à 30 ans, dont 6 scolarises. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

Djumapiri est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des semences sélectionnées et des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, Djumapiri voudrait être le premier agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Djumapiri is part of the group Indatwa B /Bgrm NO 14. He is 63 years old. He is married and has eight children, from 12 to 30 years old. Six of the children are in school. He has a 5th grade education. 

Djumapiri is a rice farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor. 

His strategy for the growth of this business is to use select seeds and some fertilizers for his rice farming. In the next few years, he would like to be the No. 1 farmer in his region. With the profits, he plans on providing schooling to his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.ru: Илхом житель города Истаравшан. Ему 50 лет. Он жена. У него двое детей. Он занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин, где он занимается торговлей женской верхней одежды. Этим видом деятельности занимается 20 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения сезонного товара.
texts.en: Ihom is a resident of Istaravshan.  He is 50 years old, married and has two children.  He is involved in sales.  Ilhom has a store, where he sells women's outerwear.  He has been in this business for 20 years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with five children who are all enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Gasawa and he works as a farmer. Fatuma is also a farmer and, for the past eight years, has sold her goods from home. Her primary customers are villagers. Fatuma's other source of income includes husband's income. Her greatest business challenge is seasonality. Fatuma owns a house without electricity or running water and her greatest monthly expense is food. She joined Yehu because of its favorable loan products and policies.

Fatuma is requesting a 40,000 KES loan to purchase 150 kilograms of fish. In the future, she hopes to open a seafood shop.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell
